loans.name: Juana Leonor

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana; la socia tiene 54 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de lavandería ella recoge las sabanas, manteles, servilletas también algunas ropas que le mandan de turistas para que pueda lavarlo y entregarlo planchados al día siguiente o máximo en dos días las piezas grandes , su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio siendo esta actividad que realiza un par de años atrás la cual le trae muchas satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales ya que de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su lavandería y la compra de insumos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank, "LOS LIDERES", which is in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Juana is 54 years old, and lives with her partner and three children.  She alternates her daily activity with her laundry service.  She launders bed sheets, tablecloths, napkins and other clothing articles that she receives from tourists for washing and ironing which she delivers the next day, or in 48 hours if the items are large.  She has been running her business out of her home for two years and enjoys the economic and personal satisfaction it gives her as a means of providing for her family.

The member is in need of a loan to cover laundry maintenance costs and to buy supplies.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To cover laundry maintenance costs and to buy supplies

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora, de 63 años; es una mujer extraordinaria. Pues a pesar de su edad sigue trabajando para poder salir adelante, ya que sus hijos propia formaron su familia, y ahora son independientes. Actualmente trabaja y vive en su casa propia ubicada en las afueras de la ciudad de San Ramón (selva central peruana). El trabajo al que se dedica está abnegada mujer es la venta de frutas de toda variedad. Constantemente viaja a la ciudad de Tarma, donde vende frutas al menudeo, pues en la sierra del país no se encuentran estas frutas, por ello en cada viaje que realiza le brinda buenas ganancias. Asimismo se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, patos y cuyes, que también son animales muy escasos en la selva central, por ella la venta de carne de estos animales obtiene regulares ganancias mayores al dinero invertido. Lo que más le gusta, es “trabajar”, pues le gusta mantenerse ocupada, es por eso que ahora tiene planeado sembrar mango, con lo que podrá variar la venta de diferentes frutas. Según menciona son pocos los que se dedican en la siembra de este fruto y las temporadas de cosecha y maduración son una vez al año; por lo que es muy cotizado en el mercado. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las brisas”, y este es el octavo crédito que tiene con MFP, donde se siente agradecida por el apoyo que recibe. Teodora, con el crédito que solicita comprará varias frutas para poder comercializarlas en la ciudad de Tarma.
texts.en:
Teodora is 63 years old and an extraordinary woman.  Despite her age she continues to work to get ahead since her children have formed their own families and are independent.  She works and lives in her own home on the outskirts of the city of San Ramón (Peruvian central forest).  This self-sacrificing woman works selling all types of fruit.  She travels constantly to the city of Tarma where she sells fruit retail.  The type of fruit she sells is hard to find in the mountain area so she makes a good profit everytime she travels there.  

She also raises small animals such as hens, ducks and guinea pigs, which are also scarce in the central forest.  Income on sales of these types of animals is greater than money invested.  What she enjoys most about "working" is that it keeps her active; so now she is planning to grow mangos to add variety to her fruit range.  She says few people grow this type of fruit and the ripening and harvest season are once a year so the market price is high.

She belongs to the communal bank, "Las brisas".  This is her eighth loan through MFP, to which she is grateful for the support received.

Teodora plans to use the loan to buy a variety of fruit to sell in the city of Tarma.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fruit

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Catalina; la socia es casada y tiene 8 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de chompas, gorros y bolsas ella viaja hasta la Ciudad de Juliaca para comprar su mercadería para luego venderlo de forma ambulatoria e independiente a sus clientes que le solicitan, a la vez la socia vende golosinas como galletas,dulces,chicles,chocolates entre otros la socia cuenta con una carreta donde expone sus productos para ser vendidos, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para sus negocios.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Catalina is a member of "Los Líderes" (The Leaders) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Catalina is married and has 8 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying and selling sweaters, caps and bags.  She travels to the city of Juliaca to buy her merchandise and then sells it independently, in an itinerant manner, to her customers who request it.  Catalina also sells candies such as cookies, sweets, chewing gum, chocolates, etc.  She tells us that she has a small cart where she displays the products that she sells.  Catalina is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get ahead in life.

Catalina is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for her businesses.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her businesses

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra M. M., tiene la edad de 24 años, está casada, vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo que son mayores prioridades. Ella  pretende con el crédito comprar unos cerdos para su crianza y engorde para su posterior venta. Ella cuenta con las instalaciones y los chiqueros para su instancia, también ella cuenta con la experiencia necesaria para su explotación y será un proyecto de ella y su esposo. Ella pretende es generar ingresos para su bienestar familiar y así tener una mejor calidad de vida. Ella piensa en el futuro de sus hijos por lo cual quiere ir creciendo  con su negocio para en un futuro poder darles su estudio y que sean profesionales en  alguna área especifica.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Sandra M. M. is 24 years old, married, and lives with her husband and two children who are her main priorities.  She plans to use her loan to buy some pigs to raise, fatten and then sell.  She already has the facilities and the pig pens.  She also has the experience she needs to carry out the project.  She will carry out the project together with her husband.

Sandra plans to make income for her family so that they can enjoy a better quality of life.  She is thinking of her children's future and, for this reason, she would like to grow her business so that, in the future, she can provide her children with an education and see them become professionals in a specific field.

This is Sandra's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  She hasn't had any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered her this loan with better repayment terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Manuel; él tiene 32 años de edad, soltero; el socio es ingeniero de sistemas y trabaja para una empresa estatal de lunes a viernes por las mañanas, el socio se siente feliz en su trabajo ya que le brinda satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales el socio es una persona bien alegre y responsable con las ganas de seguir luchando cada día para que tenga un mejor futuro.

El socio solicita el préstamo para sus gastos personales como la compra de ropa,zapatos entre otros y tambien para apoyar economicamente en el negocio de su mama que tiene una lavanderia. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Manuel is a member of "Los Líderes" (The Leaders) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Manuel is 32 years old and single.  He is a systems engineer and works for a state-run company, Monday to Friday mornings.  Manuel feels happy in his work as it brings him both financial and personal satisfaction.  He is a very cheerful and responsible person who has a desire to continue working hard every day so that he can enjoy a better future.

Manuel is requesting this loan for his personal use to purchase clothes and shoes, among others, as well as to be able to economically support his mother who has a clothes-washing business.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase clothes

loans.name: Memsu Group

texts.en:
Isatu J. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Isatu was born in Makeni city, about 38 years ago. She is married to a teacher and the couple has one child who is attending secondary school. Isatu sells gara lappers (locally dyed cloth) and has been in this business for five years now.

With the help of this loan, Isatu and her group members will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Isatu will use her share of the loan, 1,000,000 Sierra Leonean leones (SLL),  to buy gara lapper making materials--ink, caustic soda, powder, white cotton cloth, etc.--in order to produce a larger quantity of cloth for sale.

loans.use: to buy materials for making dyed cloth

loans.name: Buenerge

texts.es:
Don Buenerge, es un señor dedicado a la siembra de maíz y frijol, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, tiene 56 años de edad y vive en compañía de su esposa, y tres hijos de 22, 20 y 16 años de edad, Él trabaja la agricultura desde hace 35 años, todos los días de la semana y más cuando es la temporada de siembra o de recoger la cosecha.
Él actualmente necesita un préstamo, pues iniciara el proceso de preparación de tierras y comprara materiales agrícolas (abono, fertilizantes) ya que se acerca el invierno y es propicio para iniciar el proceso de siembra. Estos fondos le ayudaran a cubrir el gasto y podrá contar con lo necesario para cuidar este nuevo cultivo y esperar una buena cosecha.
Para él trabajar en la tierra es su principal objetivo, pues lleva tantos años en este oficio y que no piensa en abandonar esta labor, y seguir ayudando a su familia sobre todo a sus hijos en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Buenerge is a gentleman who works growing corn and beans.  He is 56 years old and lives in San Rafael Oriente, in San Miguel department, together with his wife and three children aged 22, 20 and 16.  He has been farming for 35 years and works every day of the week.  He works longer during the sowing and harvest seasons.

Buenerge currently needs a loan as he is starting the process of preparing his land and he needs to buy agricultural supplies (manure and fertilizers).  The winter is approaching and the time is right to start sowing his crops.  This loan will help him to cover the expense and he will have everything he needs to care for his new crops.  He hopes for a good harvest.

Buenerge's main goal is to work his land.  He has been in this business for many years and he does not plan to stop.  He will continue helping his family, in particular he will support his children in their education.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Roberto Junior

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Junior Roberto; él tiene 28 años de edad, separado y tiene 1 hijo; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias brindando el servicio de taxi, el cuenta con su propio carrito para realizar este negocio él trabaja todos los días por las mañanas, su horario puede variar de acuerdo a las actividades diarias que pueda tener, el socio es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta con las ganas de seguir adelante por su hijo. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de algunos accesorios que le hacen falta para su carrito.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Junior Roberto is a member of the "Siempre Unidos" (Always United) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Junior Roberto is 28 years old, separated, and has one child.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business providing a taxi service.  He owns his own car and works every morning.  His work hours vary depending on what daily activities he might have to carry out.  He is a very cheerful and enthusiastic person who has a desire to get ahead in life for his son's sake.

Junior Roberto is requesting this loan to buy some accessories for his car.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy some accessories that he needs for his car

loans.name: Fredy Alexander

texts.es:
Fredy, tiene 23 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a las labores agrícolas, sembrando maíz y frijoles, vive con su madre y dos hermanos de 11 y 14 años de edad, Fredy inicio a cultivar cuando tenía 14 años de edad, cuando su padre lo llevaba al campo para que aprendiera el proceso, hoy día trabaja a tiempo completo de 6:00am a 3:00pm todos los días de la semana.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes, para cuidar el próximo cultivo que realizara, esta compra le ayudara a tener los insumos necesario y cuidar del cultivo durante todo el proceso de siembra, crecimiento y cosecha del fruto.
Algunos riesgos en este trabajo es que el invierno sea fuerte e inunde las parcelas de tierra sembrada, pero Fredy es optimista y su objetivo es que la cosecha sea mejor cada vez, ya que de su comercialización ayuda a su madre con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Fredy is 23 years old and lives in San Rafael Oriente, in San Miguel department.  He is a farmer who grows corn and beans.  He lives with his mother and two siblings aged 11 and 14.  Fredy started farming at the age of 14 when his father took him out to the fields and taught him the process.  He now works full time, from 6.00am to 3.00pm, every day of the week.

Fredy is requesting a loan to buy manure and fertilizers so that he can care for his next crop.  This purchase will help him to have the supplies he needs  to care for his crops throughout the whole sowing, growing and harvesting process.

Some of the risks of this work are that winters are extreme and recently-sown plots of land can flood.  However, Fredy is optimistic and his goal is for his harvest to continue to improve since selling his crops allows him to help his mother with their household expenses.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Teresa tiene 41 años, es muy jovial y emprendedora. Vive en su casa junto a su hijo de 19 años, por quien se esfuerza todo los días. Es estudiante, en una universidad pública para docencia, motivo por el cual aprovecha para vender productos de belleza y joyas de fantasía fina, a sus compañeras de estudio y de otras aulas, este negocio le esta yendo muy bien, ya que sus ganancias son buenas. Por ello, le gusta mucho su negocio,  ya que no necesita invertir tiempo adicional, más de lo contrario, capta buenas utilidades, con las que se cubre sus pasajes y los estudios de su hijo. De seguir así, está segura de poder brindarle toda su educación y hacer un profesional de éxito. Además, se  siente contenta, por ella misma,  ya que su carrera  postergada de hace muchos años, la retomó y pronto lo ejercerá. Por ello, no duda en derrochar todas sus energías para lograrlo y con el tiempo, anhela  incrementar su capital y ampliar su negocio de cosméticos y diversidad de joyas. Este es su veinteavo crédito con MFP, y se compromete a pagar cuotas puntualmente, para acceder posteriores ayudas, para crecer con su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más productos de belleza, para atender los pedidos  pendientes de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Teresa is 41 years old.  She is a very cheerful and enterprising woman who lives in her home together with her 19 year-old son for whom she works hard every day.  Her son is a University student and Teresa takes advantage of this in order to sell beauty products and jewelry to his fellow students.  Her business is doing very well and she makes good profits.

Teresa enjoys her business a lot because she doesn't need to invest extra time in it.  On the contrary.  She makes good profits which cover her transportation costs and pay for her son's studies.  By continuing in this way, she is certain that she will be able to provide her son with a complete education and help him become a successful professional.  Teresa feels happy for herself as well because her own career was put on hold for many years but she has taken it up again and will soon practice it.  Consequently, she doesn't hesitate in throwing all her energies into achieving this and, over time, she hopes to increase her capital and expand her cosmetics and jewelry business.

This is Teresa's 20th loan from MFP and she pledges to make her repayments on time so that she can access further loans in order to grow her business.  Teresa will use the loan that she has requested to buy more beauty products so that she can fill some pending orders that she has from her customers.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to meet her customers' demands

loans.name: Estherlin Ericka

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Estherlin Ericka; la socia tiene 30 años de edad ,es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche también vende otro tipo de productos como golosinas,gaseosas,aceite entre otros, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le tare muchas satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales , ella es una persona bien entusiasta y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Estherlin Ericka is a member of "Los Líderes" (The Leaders) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Estherlin is 30 years old, lives with her partner, and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery store business.  She sells essentials such as rice, sugar and milk and also other types of products such as candies, soda, oil, etc.  Estherlin has been in this business for many years and it brings her a lot of financial and personal satisfaction.  She is a very enthusiastic person who has a great desire to get ahead in life.

Estherlin is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise so that she can offer her customers a greater variety of products.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise so that she can offer her customers a greater variety of products

loans.name: Fidel Angel

texts.es:
Don Fidel Ángel, es un señor de 40 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, vive junto a su señora esposa, y sus hijos de 17, 14 y 12 años de edad, él se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, desde hace 25 años, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre, trabaja todos los días regularmente de 6:00am a 3:00pm, ó también dependiendo de la necesidad en que se encuentre.
Actualmente está en proceso de iniciar una nueva siembra de granos básicos, para lo cual solicita un préstamo e invertirlo en abono  y fertilizantes, con esta compra puede dar un mejor cuido a la siembra y estar al pendiente del crecimiento, el cual espera le de buenos frutos, aunque siempre existen riesgos en este oficio, pues depende de las condiciones del clima los cuales pueden favorecer o dañar el cultivo.
Para don Fidel, el continuar en el trabajo es lo que lo motiva, ya que de él depende su familia y sobre todo la preparación de hijos, de los cuales espera sean profesionales en el futuro.
texts.en:
Fidel Ángel is a 40 year-old gentleman who lives in San Rafael Oriente, in San Miguel department, together with his wife and children aged 17, 14 and 12.  Fidel has been growing corn and beans for 25 years.  He learned how to farm from his father and works regularly every day from 6.00am to 3.00pm, or longer if need be.

Fidel is currently in the process of sowing a new crop of basic grains.  He is requesting a loan to invest in buying manure and fertilizers.  This purchase will enable him to better care for his crops and take care of their growth.  He hopes to obtain good fruit from his crops.

There are always risks in this business as everything depends on weather conditions which can favor or damage crops.  Fidel is motivated by his desire to continue working since his family depend on him.  In particular, he wants to prepare his children as he hopes that they will become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers for his corn crop

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elsa; la socia tiene 34 años de edad, es casada y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de picantería (lugar donde venden chicha de jora ( a base de maíz) también venden cerveza para los clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante, a la vez la socia brinda el servicio de llamadas telefónicas nacionales y locales ella realiza este negocio por el centro de la ciudad ,siendo estas dos actividades que realiza para sacar a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más cerveza y así tener más mercadería para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "The Leaders". It is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Elsa. She is 34 years old, married, and she has 1 child. She alternates her daily activities with her pub business (location where chicha de jora is sold, a corn based drink).  She also sells beer to those clients who request it. She is someone who is very happy and who is very eager to succeed. She also provides public telephone services for national calls and local calls. She has her business in the downtown area of the city. She has these two businesses in order to support her family.

She requests a loan to purchase beer and so to have enough products for her business.

She is happy to have the loan and she is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to purchase beer in order to supply her business

loans.name: Hebert

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SIEMPRE UNIDOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Hebert; él tiene 26 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; el socio es guía de turismo y trabaja con distintas agencias del Cusco operando turismo de aventura y turismo convencional como Valle Sagrado, City tours y tours a Machupicchu, Choquequirao entre otros, el socio es una persona bien alegre y le gusta mucho su carrera ya que le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales y de esta forma el apoya a su hijo que es lo más importante que tiene.

El socio solicita el préstamo para Los estudios de su hijo.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Always Together". It is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. 

His name is Hebert. He is 26 years old, married common-law, and he has 1 child. He is a tourist guide and he works with different agencies in Cusco offering adventure and conventional tourism.  He works for agencies such as Valle Sagrado and City Tours offering tours to Machupicchu, Choquequirao and others. He is someone who is very happy and he loves his career because it brings him satisfaction, both financially and personally. This is how he is able to support his child, which is the most important thing. 

He requests a loan to pay for his son's schooling fees.

He is happy to have this loan and he is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to pay for his son's schooling fees

loans.name: Sebastiana

texts.es: Sebastiana C.:de 20 años de edad es casada tiene una hija de 18 meses de edad, tiene su venta de cosmeticos y de productos varios ella inicio su negocio desde muy pequeña ya que su padre era propietario pero decidio darselo como herencia para que ella con el tiempo lo iciera crecer y le apoyara a su esposo con el gasto de su hogar para brindarle una mejor vida a su hija ella hoy en dia tiene una demanda muy grande de productos y devido a la falta de capital no puede surtir mas su negocio es por ello que ella solicita un credito para la compra de productos de cosmeticos como,perfumes,shampoo.arete y collares etc.y que su negocio tenga mas productos y ella pueda vender mas.
texts.en: Sebastiana C. is 20 years old, married, and she has an 18-month old baby girl. She has a cosmetics business where she sells a variety of products. She started her business since she was very young, especially because her father was the owner of the business but he decided to inherit it to her so that with time she will make it grow. She is able to help her husband with the household expenses and to provide a better quality of life for her daughter. She currently sees a great demand for her products but she does not have the capital funds to stock her business. For this reason she requests a loan. She will purchase products such as cosmetics, perfumes, shampoo, earrings, necklaces etc. Her business will then have more products and she will be able to sell more.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, perfumes, shampoo, earrings, and necklaces

loans.name: Jose Edilberto

texts.es:
José, de 32 años de edad, se dedica a prestar servicio como motorista de una moto taxi, dando el transporte a las personas del lugar, reside en Usulután, junto a su esposa y una hija de cinco años de edad, él trabaja desde hace un año en su propio medio de transporte, todos los días de la semana de 6:00am a 6:00pm.
Él necesita un préstamo para pagar la reparación de la moto taxi, ya que presenta problemas de los cuales debe un mecánico revisar y reparar, con este préstamo solventara esta necesidad y dará el cuido y mantenimiento necesario a su medio transporte, ofreciendo mayor seguridad a los clientes que viajan con él.
Su objetivo es trabajar de forma amable y honesta con los clientes, ya que el sostiene a su familia
texts.en:
José is 32 years old and runs a moto-taxi service for people living in his area.  He's been in business for a year, using his own transportation, and works from 6:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.   He lives in Usulután with his wife and five-year-old daughter.

He is in need of a loan to pay for repair and maintenance of his moto-taxi due to problems that arise requiring mechanical checkup and repair.  He plans to use the loan for this purpose so he can maintain his vehicle and provide his customers with a safe mode of transportation.

His goal is to be kind and honest with his customers so he can support his family.

loans.use: To pay for repair and maintenance of his moto-taxi

loans.name: Teko Sanda Traders Group

texts.en:
Posseh K. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Posseh was born in Makeni city, about 26 years ago. She is married to a soldier and the couple has two children who are attending primary school. Posseh sells rice, cigarettes, sweets, biscuits, etc. and has been in this business for four years now.

With the help of this loan, Posseh and her group members will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Posseh will use her share of the loan, 1,000,000 Sierra Leonean leones (SLL), to buy rice, cigarettes, sweets, and biscuits in large quantity to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, cigarettes, sweets, and biscuits, in bulk

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es: Bernardina, es una noble mujer D. 51 años. Vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo Roberto, D. 54 años y sus 3 hijos mayores. DesD. hace dos años, se dedica en la venta D. verduras, en un puesto dentro D. un mercado D. su barrio, ubicada a media hora D. su casa en carro. Para abastecer D. verduras y tubérculos, acuD. a las 4 D. la mañana al mercado mayoristas D. Lima (la parada), D. donD. compra al por mayor, y eso D. las 7 D. la mañana, arriba a su puesto, en las que  atienD. hasta las 2 D. la tarD. con la ayuda D. su hija. D. esta manera, Bernardina capta buenas utilidades, con los que paga sin preocupación el alquiler D. su puesto. Le gusta su negocio, sobre todo el tener un puesto repleto D. verduras y tubérculos frescos. Por eso, en esta temporada  le urge abastecerse D. varios sacos D. papa, por lo que constantemente varia D. precio, para ella su objetivo es ampliar su negocio. Ingresa a su noveno crédito con MFP, y se compromete  en pagar todas sus cuotas D. manera puntual. D. obtener el crédito que solicita, va proveerse  D. más verduras y tubérculos, para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en: Bernardina is a noble woman who is 51 years old. She lives in a house that is her own, together with her husband Roberto, 54 years old, and their 3 grown children. For the past two years she has had a produce business, selling from a stand in her neighborhood market. It is located thirty minutes away, by car. In order to acquire the produce and tubers that she needs, she sets out at 4am to the wholesalers market in Lima (La Parada), where she makes her purchases in wholesale. At 7am she arrives at her stand and she sells until 2pm with her daughter’s help.  This is how Bernardina is able to acquire good earnings, with which she is able to pay the rental fee of her stand without any problems.  She loves her business, especially when the stand is stacked with fresh vegetables and tubers. It is urgent for her to supply her business with various sacks of potatoes, a product that is always varying in price. Her objective is to expand her business. This is her ninth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to making her payments in a timely manner. With the loan she requests, she will acquire more vegetables and tubers to supply her business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and tubers to supply her business

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita tiene 63 años. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo José, de 65 años y su hija de los 7 que tiene en total. Por más de 17 años, se dedica a su negocio que es una librería, situado en el primer ambiente de su casa. En este negocio atiende con el apoyo de su hijo y su nuera, durante la mañana y la noche. Por ser un negocio muy surtido y atractivo, le ha dado mucha ventaja ya que sus clientes son en su mayoría sus vecinos y amistades de su barrio, siendo muy concurrido  así es como ha logrado captar buenas utilidades. Por ello, constantemente trata de proveerse de más novedades de la ciudad de Lima que queda a una hora de camino en carro. Mientras tanto su hijo atiende su negocio, y de ese modo su librería ni un solo día se cierra, además vende a precios muy  asequibles. Está muy contenta con su negocio, por ello su idea es aumentar de mercadería y, de ese modo crecer más y más. Es su octavo crédito que tiene con MFP y se compromete pagar todas sus cuotas como siempre lo hizo. De obtener el crédito que solicita, piensa comprar todo tipo de artículos y útiles escolares, para implementar más su negocio.
texts.en: Felicita is 63 years old and she lives in a house that is her own, together with her husband Jose, 65 years old, and their daughter, one of seven children they have in total. She has had a bookstore for more than 17 years. It is located on the main level of her house. She manages her business with the help of her son and her daughter-in-law, in the mornings and evenings. The business has a good variety and it is attractive so it has been a great advantage that her clients are primarily her neighbors and friends in the community. It is well visited and so she is able to acquire good earnings. She is always trying to acquire new articles in the city of Lima, located at an hour's drive by car. Meanwhile her son manages the business and this is who her library does not close, not for a single day.  She sells at very affordable prices. She is very happy with her business so her plan is to increase her merchandise and to make her business grow more and more. This is her eighth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to making her payments, as she always has. She plans on using her loan to purchase all types of articles and school supplies to supplement her business.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies and articles for the home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase home products for resale

loans.name: Evelina

texts.es: Evelina tiene 51 años, es una mujer muy jovial. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos de los 4 que son en total. Por muchos años tuvo su bodega, y debido a una enfermedad dejó su negocio. Ahora en su local que era su bodega, su esposo trasladó materiales de su negocio propio como micas y espejos, para motos. Desde entonces lleva 8 años trabajando en sociedad con él, aprendiendo a cortar micas de acuerdo a la silueta de la luna de las motos, le ha costado mucho aprender y sobre todo tener precisión en el corte y hora lo realiza tan bien. Asimismo recarga baterías de moto, puesto que con el crédito anterior se compró su cargador de baterías, de ese modo se genera sus propias ganancias. Esta contenta de realizar su negocio y más aún por su hijo menor; que es muy hábil en la instalación de repuestos de motos. Ingresa a su octavo crédito que tiene con MFP, y se compromete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente. Asimismo está feliz de trabajar con sus compañeras de su grupo, porque son personas muy responsables De obtener el crédito que solicita comprará más baterías, para atender los pedidos pendiente que tiene.
texts.en: Evelina is 51 years old and she is a very jovial woman. She lives in her own home together with her husband and with two of their four children. For many years she had a grocery store but after an illness she was forced to abandon it. Now, her store which was once her grocery store, her husband has moved materials from his business, such as mirrors and motorcycle accessories. She has been working together with him for 8 years, learning to cut decals to match the contours of a motorcycle. It has been difficult for her to learn, especially for the precision that is required, but now she knows how to do it well. She also recharges motorcycle batteries. With her previous loan she purchase a battery charger, and this is how she earns money of her own. She is happy to carry out her business and more so for the sake of her young son. He is very capable of repairing motorcycles. This is her eighth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to making her payments on time. She is also happy to work with her colleagues in the group because they are all responsible individuals.  With her loan she will purchase batteries in order to fill the orders that have been placed.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle batteries

loans.name: Pachaquiej Beya Group

texts.es:
Armando Yovani C. A., es casado, tiene 32 años de edad, cursos los seis años de educación primaria, se dedica al comercio a la reventa de ropa, tiene 6 años de experiencia con este oficio, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa que se dedica a oficios domesticos, quiere solicitar un préstamo para ampliación de su capital de trabajo, ya que va a comprar mas ropa para su reventa; por esta razón decide organizar un grupo con el fin de solicitar el préstamo. Los integrantes del grupo se dedican a diferentes oficios productivos como: Servicio de arrerradero, albañileria, contadora de un establecimiento educativo. 

Esperan que con el préstamo logren mejorar sus ingresos y la condicion de vida de cada uno de los integrantes
texts.en:
Armando Yovani C. A. is married, 32 years old, and he has a grade six education. He has a clothing business and he has six years' experience in the field. He has his wife's support. She is a housewife.  He wishes to request a loan to supplement his working capital funds, to purchase more clothing for resale. This is the reason why he decided to organize a group and to request a loan. The members of the group have different businesses, such as: lumber services, carpenter, and educational institution accountant. 

They hope that the loan will help them improve their income and the quality of life of each of the members.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Irma Carolina

texts.es: Irma Carolina: es de 33 años es casada tiene 3 hijos que estan estudiando, su negocio es un cafe internet y una venta de productos pra el hogar como shampoo,detergente,suavisante,para ropa,etc, esta situado en su domicilio con la ayuda de su esposo ha tenido mucha demanda para su negocio y nececita un nuevo credito para para poder comprar computadoras,un escritorio,y productos para el hogar,y asi dar un mejor servicio a su clientes le da gracias a Dios por haber encontrado esta intitucion que le a apoyado con darle el credito anterior el cual pago con puntualidad.
texts.en: Irma Carolina is 33 years old and she has 3 children who are in school. She has an internet cafe business and she also sells household items such as shampoo, detergents, fabric softeners, etc. Her business is installed in her home and, with the help of her husband; she has had a great deal of demand for her business. She needs t anew loan to purchase computers, a desk, and products for the home. She will be able to provide her clients with a better level of service. She thanks God for having found this organization that has supported with a loan. The previous loan she had was paid on time.

loans.use: to purchase comptuers, a desk, and to purchase products for the home

loans.name: Saray Y Responsabilidad 1 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Carina is a 37-year-old borrower who lives in San Pedro de Macorís, Dominican Republic. Carina is the coordinator for her group, Saray y Responsabilidad 1 & 3 and her story is representative of the other borrowers in the group.

Carina lives in La Habana, a rural neighborhood in the city of San Pedro. She lives with her only child and she is a single mother. She runs a small accessories sales business from her home and by walking into her community. She will use this loan to increase her inventory. She started her business after she took her first loan in Esperanza. Now she is receiving 6th loan.

San Pedro is a small city with many amenities. Unfortunately, there are several neighborhoods which lack access to those amenities. Most of the city has running water, somewhat reliable electricity, and decent waste management. Despite the difficulties in her community, Carina is happy that she has access to loans which have given her more business in her neighborhood. With the extra profits from her business, she is able to improve her business;  she also hopes to save enough to have her own house and send her child to the university. Thank you for your loan to Carina and the Saray y Responsabilidad group!

loans.use: to buy accessories like jewelery and watches

loans.name: Julia Liliana

texts.es:
Julia Liliana:de 48 años casadatiene 4 hijos el cual todos ya estan casados Julia es una mujer muy trabajadora ya que lleva 10 años en la actividad que es de costura y reposteria que se encuentra en su domicilio ella solicita un nuevo credito para poder domprar una maquina de coser y una batidora industrial para poder darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes ya que es muy buena en su trabajo y eso a generado mucha demanda en su negocio.
esta muy agradecida por el apoyo que le an brindado a ella.
texts.en:
Julia Liliana is 48 years old, married, and she has 4 children who are all married. Julia is a very hard working person and she has 10 years in business as a seamstress and a baker. She has a shop installed in her house and she requests a new loan to purchase a new sewing machine and an industrial mixer to provide her clients with a better level of service. She is very good at what she does and so she has earned a great demand in her business. 

She is very thankful for the support that has been provided to her.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and an industrial mixer

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa forma parte del banco comunal “Unidas siempre unidas” perteneciente a la ciudad de Concepción. Ella se dedica al corte y confección de ropa de casa, vale decir; cortinas, sábanas, cortinas y accesorios para baño.
Rosa se dedica a éste oficio desde hace 4 años aproximadamente. Ella trabaja desde su casa, confeccionando productos a pedido. Las temporadas de más alta demanda son para el día de la madre, navidad y fiesta costumbrista de la independencia de Chile. Cuando le quedan productos su hija es quien los vende en su lugar de estudio, al igual que Rosa, quien además trabaja como asesora del hogar en casas particulares y también ofrece sus productos de confección. Su horario laboral como asesora es de lunes a viernes por las mañanas y en las tardes se dedica a la confección de ropa de lunes a domingo. Por tanto sus clientes y ganancias han aumentado considerablemente. 
Su mercadería la compra en la ciudad de Concepción, en distribuidoras de telas las cuales los costos son menores, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente. 
Con éste préstamo pretende comprar insumos para su negocio específicamente; telas, blondas, hilos y cierres.
Rosa vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 20 y 11 años. Ella es el único ingreso económico de su familia. Las motivaciones de Rosa de seguir en el negocio es costear los estudios superiores de su hija de 20 años, quien estudia odontología. 
El sueño de Rosa es instalar un taller en su casa, de manera de poder ampliar el espacio en el cual trabaja en la actualidad.
Rosa está muy agradecida y contenta del crédito otorgado por Fondo esperanza, ya que podrá  invertir y aumentar su productividad. Además disfruta mucho de las reuniones que se realizan junto a las demás socias, ya que comparten nuevas experiencias de vida y esfuerzo.
Concepción, está asentada en la desembocadura del río Bíobío, uno de los más grandes del país, al sur de Chile, en la región del Bíobío. Ha tenido una importante función en nuestra historia, siendo sede de importantes batallas y asentamiento relevante, especialmente durante la Guerra de Arauco, por estar en la frontera con territorio mapuche. Actualmente la ciudad posee un importante desarrollo económico y demográfico, llegando a ser considerada como uno de los núcleos urbanos, demográfico, administrativo, financiero y comercial más relevantes de Chile, después de Santiago y Valparaíso.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the "Unidas Siempre Unidas" (United Always United) community bank which is located in the city of Concepción.  Her business is making soft furnishings such as drapes, sheets and bathroom accessories.

Rosa has been in this business for approximately 4 years.  She works from home, making products to order.  Her busiest seasons are Mother's Day, Christmas and the festive period around Chilean independence day.  When she has products left over, her daughter takes them to sell at college.  Rosa also works as a maid in private houses and takes advantage of this to sell her products.  Rosa works as a maid on weekday mornings and she makes her furnishings from Monday to Sunday in the afternoons.  Her customers and profits have increased considerably.

Rosa buys her supplies in the city of Concepción.  She buys from fabric wholesalers whose products are cheaper and therefore more financially convenient.

Rosa will use this loan to buy supplies for her business, specifically fabric, lace, threads and fasteners.

Rosa lives with her husband and her two children aged 20 and 11.  Hers is the only income the family has.  Rosa's motivation to continue working in her business is to pay for her 20 year-old daughter's higher education.  She is studying dentistry.

Rosa's dream is to set up a workshop in her home so that she can expand the space in which she currently works.

Rosa is very grateful for, and happy with, the loan she has been granted by Fondo Esperanza since she will be able to invest and increase her productivity.  She also enjoys the meetings with her fellow community bank members since they share new experiences.

Concepción is located at the mouth of the River Bíobío, one of the biggest rivers in the country.  It is in the south of Chile, in Bíobío region.  This city has played an important part in our history as it was the scene of some important battles and notable settlement, especially during the Arauco War as it formed the border with Mapuche territory.  The city currently has high economic and demographic growth.  It is becoming considered one of the most important urban, demographic, administrative, financial and commercial centers in Chile after Santiago and Valparaíso.

loans.use: to buy fabric, lace, threads and fasteners

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia forma parte del banco comunal “Unidas siempre unidas”, perteneciente a la ciudad de Concepción. 
Ella se dedica a vender comida rápida especialmente sopaipillas, completos y papas fritas. Patricia vende sus productos en lugares establecidos como colegios y empresas de construcción, ya que es en estos sitios donde se sitúa la gran cantidad de sus clientes, que son estudiantes y trabajadores. Para conservar sus productos en buen estado utiliza un cooler. Patricia tiene muchos clientes y muy diversos. Además ella se dedica  a la venta de utensilios de aseo por lo que los horarios lo flexibiliza Patricia. 
Con el préstamo comprará un carrito que contiene en su interior un fogón o cocinilla, además invertirá en insumos para su otro negocio que es la venta de artículos de aseo.
Su sueño es trabajar desde su casa e instalar su propio local comercial, donde pueda ofrecer con mayor facilidad sus productos. 
Patricia vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos, uno de ellos estudiará una carrera técnica relacionada con la construcción. Es por esto su motivación de continuar en el negocio, es poder generar mayores ganancias para costear los estudios superiores de su hijo.
Patricia está muy contenta del préstamo de Fondo Esperanza, ya que ha sido un apoyo fundamental para su negocio, respecto a las capacitaciones ha aprendido a registrar sus gastos e ingresos.  
Concepción, está asentada en la desembocadura del río Bíobío, uno de los más grandes del país, al sur de Chile, en la región del Bíobío. Ha tenido una importante función en nuestra historia, siendo sede de importantes batallas y asentamiento relevante, especialmente durante la Guerra de Arauco, por estar en la frontera con territorio mapuche. Actualmente la ciudad posee un importante desarrollo económico y demográfico, llegando a ser considerada como uno de los núcleos urbanos, demográfico, administrativo, financiero y comercial más relevantes de Chile, después de Santiago y Valparaíso.
texts.en:
Patricia is a member of the "Unidas Siempre Unidas" (United Always United) community bank which is located in the city of Concepción.

Patricia's business is selling fast food, especially sopaipillas (a type of fried pastry), completos (sandwiches) and fries.  She sells her products in places such as schools and construction companies since this is where a lot of her customers, who are students and workers, are located.  She uses a cooler to keep her products fresh.  Patricia has a wide range of customers.  In addition to this business, she also sells personal care products and she works her hours around both businesses.

Patricia will use this loan to buy a small cart with a burner or stove inside.  She will also invest in buying supplies for her business selling personal care products.

Patricia's dream is to work from home and set up her own business premises where she can sell her products more easily.

Patricia lives with her husband and her two children.  One of her children is going to take a vocational course in the construction field.  This gives her motivation to continue in her business as she would like to make more profits so that she can cover her son's higher education expenses.

Patricia is very happy with the loan from Fondo Esperanza since it has been a fundamental support for her business.  Through the training sessions, she has learned to keep a record of all her incomings and outgoings.

Concepción is located on the mouth of the River Bíobío, one of the biggest rivers in the country.  The city is in the south of Chile, in Bíobío region.  It has played an important part in our country's history as it was the scene of some important battles and notable settlement, especially during the Araucho War as it was on the border with Mapuche territory.  The city is currently experiencing a high level of financial and demographic development and is starting to be considered one of the most important urban, demographic, administrative, economic and demographic centers in Chile after Santiago and Valparaíso.

loans.use: to buy a small cart that has a burner or stove inside

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia tiene 54 años, es separada D. su esposo y vive con el menor D. sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. DesD. hace 8 años venD. productos alimenticios en su tienda, negocio que atienD. desD. la mañana hasta el medio día, asimismo tiene un kiosco D. venta D. golosinas en el interior D. un colegio, que se encuentra cerca D. su casa, en ese mismo lugar aprovecha para expender comida a los docente y alumnos D. dicho centro educativo. D. esta manera su economía se ha estabilizado. Por otra parte su hijo la ayuda en el negocio, ya que además cuenta con una persona que contrata pero a veces no se da abasto. Considera que su negocio es estable porque tiene clientela fija y sus ventas son aseguradas por lo que tiene muchos deseos D. seguir creciendo. Es su crédito número 10 que esta solicitando con MFP, se siente muy feliz D. ser parte D. su banco comunal que en su localidad es un ejemplo D. solidaridad y D. la que aprendió bastante para su vida, y en esta oportunidad seguirá comprometiéndose en ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra D. mercadería en dulces y abarrotes para ambos negocios que tiene.
texts.en: Julia is 54, separated, and lives with the youngest of her three children in her own home. Eight years ago she stared selling food products in her own store, from morning until noon. She also runs a small snack shop within a school complex that is close to her home, and sells to the students and staff of the school. This is how she maintains a stable income. Her son helps with the business and sometimes she has one other person part time. Julia feels that her business is growing and her clientele is stable. This is her tenth credit with her community lender, which has maD. such a difference in the community. She is committed to prompt repayment of the loan, which she will use to buy inventory to supply food and snack items for her businesses.

loans.use: To buy basic ingredients for food preparation and snacks for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wholesale corn and firewood to make tortillas

loans.name: Betzabe

texts.es: Betzabe tiene 45 años, vive a lado de su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 7 años se dedica a vender tejidos, prendas que ella elabora en su misma casa, pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su madre. La cantidad de estas prendas tejidas lo hace por pedidos cada mes, logrando percibir buenas ganancias.  Ella tiene la característica de trabajar de manera ordenada y siempre procura estar al tanto de la moda y de los novedosos diseños que se presentan. Ante esto sus clientes se muestran satisfechos con los tejidos. En adelante desea aumentar la cantidad  de prendas tejidas y aprender otros puntos de tejidos para tener mayor demanda de su mercadería. Es su crédito número 6 con MFP,  considera que es una gran oportunidad haber tenido acceso para créditos que le han beneficiado enormemente en el crecimiento económico para su familia de la cual se siente muy agradecida. Con el crédito estará destinado en la compra de lana al por mayor.
texts.en:
Betzabe, age 45, lives at her husband’s side with their two children in their own house.  She has been selling woven garments, which she makes in her own house.  Sometimes her mother helps her.  She makes the quantity of garments that are ordered each month.  This is how she manages to get good earnings.  She works in an organized way, and she always strives to be up to date with the fashion and the new designs that are shown. 

Later she wishes to increase her quantity of woven garments and learn other stitches in order to have a greater demand in the market.  This is her 6th loan with MFP.  She feels that this is a great opportunity to have had access to loans.  They have been extremely beneficial to the economic growth of her family, and she is very grateful.  The loan is to buy wool wholesale.

loans.use: to buy wholesale wool

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia tiene 42 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 5 años expende comida en la puerta de su casa, para ello cuenta con un stand móvil para preparar sándwich, asimismo tiene bancas para comodidad de sus clientes. Desde entonces trabaja todas las tardes hasta alta horas de la noche, para ella su objetivo es vender la totalidad de la comida que ha preparado así asegura mayores ganancias. En ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su hermana,  pero la mayoría de veces lo hace sola, menciona además que le gusta su trabajo, por que puede estar pendiente de sus hijos. Es la octavo crédito con MFP y en todo este tiempo de haber accedido a los créditos a aprendido a ser prudente  en sus gastos y distribuir en sus múltiples necesidades por lo que se siente muy agradecida. Con el crédito que solicita,  lo invertirá en la compra de algunos ingredientes y platos descartables.
texts.en:
Celia, age 42, lives with her husband and their two children in her own house.  She has been selling food at the door to her house for over five years.  To do this she has a mobile stand where she makes sandwiches.  She has benches for her customers’ comfort.  She works every afternoon until late in the evening.  Her objective is to sell all of the food that she has prepared.  This assures her of greater earnings.

At times her sister helps her, but most of the time she works alone.  She likes her work because she is able to spend time with her children. 

This is her eighth loan with MFP.  In all of the time that she has had loans, she has learned to be prudent in her expenses and to allocate them for her many needs.  She is very grateful for this.  She will use the requested loan to buy some ingredients and disposable plates.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and disposable plates

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Maria Teresa se dedica a la venta de artículos publicitarios. Tiene más de 31 años en este negocio. Su negocio consiste en coser bolsos, con lemas publicitarios, por lo que tiene una buena cantidad de pedidos, ella recibe ayuda de una muchacha que labora con ella en la fabricación de sus productos. Su negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación, pues a pesar de no tener mucho espacio confecciona los bolsos, mochilas, cartucheras entre otros productos. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de hilos, tijeras, telas, material especial para los bolsos, cajas, bolsas entre otras cosas. Pues aquí donde logra obtener los ingresos necesarios para su hogar.
texts.en:
Maria Teresa sells advertising materials.  She has been in this business for over 31 years.  Her business consists of making bags with publicity slogans, and she has a good number of orders. She has help from a girl who works with her making her products.  

Her business is located in her house.  In spite of not having much space; she makes bags, backpacks, pouches, and other products. 

The loan she is requesting is to buy thread, scissors, fabric, and special material for the bags, boxes, purses, and other things.  This is where she manages to get the income that her household needs.

loans.use: to buy thread, scissors, fabric, and special material for  bags, boxes, purses, and other things l

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic needs food items

loans.name: Enith

texts.es: Enith tiene 24 años, vive en compañía de sus padres en la propiedad que poseen. Casi toda su vida  ha estado ligada al comercio de productos alimenticios, sus padres se ha dedicado durante muchos años a esta actividad, y en la actualidad ella comercializa, como parte de su propia fuente de ingresos, estos productos, permitiéndole sostenerse económicamente. Es así que viaja el fin de semana a las zonas rurales de su localidad para vender arroz, azúcar y menestras; productos que son muy escasos en esa localidad. Pese a la los problemas coyunturales de su país, como es el alza de precios, que como consecuencia sus ganancias son menos, sin embargo lo supera vendiendo productos de primera necesidad logrando recuperar lo invertido. Esto le llena de satisfacción y animo para continuar en este negocio por lo que desea mejorar y abastecerse de más productos. Es su crédito número 10  con MFP, para ella ha sido una experiencia gratificante pertenecer a su banco comunal de la que se siente orgullosa y en lo largo de este tiempo ha demostrado ser muy responsable en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería como: arroz, azúcar y menestras.
texts.en: Enith is 24 years old. She lives with her parents on their property. She has been connected to the food products business for almost her whole life. Her parents have worked in this activity for many years. At present, she sells these products for her own income, allowing her to support herself financially. That is why she travels weekends to rural areas around her town to sell rice, sugar, and vegetable stews, products that are very scare in that area. Despite the situational problems in her country, such as rising prices, which make her earnings go down, she has been able to overcome by selling basic necessity products and make back her investment. This fillls her with satisfaction and enthusiam to continue in this business because she wants to get ahead and stock up on more products. This is her 10th loan with MFP. For her, belonging to a community bank has been a gratifying experience that she is proud of. Over time, she has shown herself to be very responsible with her payments. With the loan she is asking for, she will invest in more merchandise such as: rice, sugar and vegetable stews.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar and vegetable stews.

loans.name: Lina Elizabeth

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Esperanza y Progreso  se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos la señora Lina, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y fruto de  esta relación tiene tres hijos, uno es mayor de edad y los otros  de 16 y 9 años, todos estudian en Universidad, colegio y escuela. Su esposo trabaja en otro país.
 
Tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, en ella también vende artículos de bazar, ropa, ciertos remedios y productos de papelería. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 22h00, su mamá y sus hijos le ayudan cuando ellos pueden y tiene tiempo. Los productos los recibe de distribuidores que le llevan hasta su local. Nos cuenta que lleva con su negocio ya siete años y que le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo quiere invertir en comprar más productos como: arroz, azúcar, enlatados, detergentes, carnes, pescado, remedios y otros.  Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 10 años y le gusta porque sus compañeras son muy cumplidas.

Sus sueños son seguir mejorando dia a dia.
texts.en:
The Esperanza y Progreso [Hope and Progress] community bank meets every two weeks in the Montecristi canton. The place is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its artisanal crafts, recognized nationally and internationally. This is where the famous 'paja toquilla' [Panama hats] are from.  

In this place we met Lina, 40 years old. She is married and has three children. One in an adult and the others are 16 and 9. All of them go to college, highschool and school. Her husband works in another country. 
 
She has a grocery store in her house. She also sells other products there, such as clothes, certain remedies and paper products. She works every day from 6:00 a.m. until 10:00 p.m. Her mother and her children help her when they can and have time. She receives products from distributors who deliver them to her locale. She tells us that she has had the business for seven years already and it is going very well for her.  

She will invest this loan in buying more products such as: rice, sugar, canned goods, detergents, meat, fish, remedies, etc. She has been in the community bank for 10 years because the other members are very responsible.

Her dreams are to keep going day to day.

loans.use: to buy rice, canned goods, detergents, meat, fish, remedies, etc.

loans.name: Mujeres Hacia El Progreso 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Margarita is one of the members of the Grupo Mujeres Hacia el Progreso 2 and 3, made up of 10 micro business owners. They all work selling clothes, natural products, shoes, food, etc. 

Margarita is very excited to be receiving her sixth loan from Esperanza Internacional, after having paid off her previous loan satisfactorily and taken a step towards business growth. She has had her business selling decorative candles for around 6 years. She started the business with her own resources. 

Margarita is planning to invest her new loan towards purchasing various products such as decorative candles, clothing, and accessories. She is going to use her earnings to continuing saving. With previous loans, she started building her house and now she is looking to finish it. Her dream is to be able to have her own well established business. 

Margarita's family is made up of herself, her husband and her 3 children, 2 of whom live with her. She tells us that her most difficult challenge is caring for her children's health and being able to satisfy this need when the moment arises. She loves to watch television and to help out at the church.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy newspapers and magazines, and to buy 'hoya' for making 'atole'

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Esperanza y Progreso se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos la señora Ruth, tiene 47 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció y quedo sola con sus  tres hijos los mismos que en la actualidad ya son  mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa y trabajan.
 
Tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, en ella también vende artículos de bazar y helados. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 22h00, además de esto también prepara almuerzos para vender, nos cuenta que todos los días hasta su local llegan bastantes clientes a servirse los deliciosos platos que ella vende pero que mas clientela tiene los fines de semana. Los productos para su tienda los compra en Manta y algunos  los recibe en su local. Nos cuenta que lleva con su negocio tres años y que le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo quiere invertir en comprar más productos como: arroz, azúcar, enlatados, detergentes, carnes, pescado, etc. que también le sirven para preparar los alimentos. Está en el Banco Comunal desde que lo fundaron, es la tesorera del mismo y le gusta por la unión del grupo.
 
Su sueño es tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Esperanza y Progreso" meets every two weeks in the Montecristi Canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and crafts and renowned both nationally and internationally.  It is the place of the famous "panama" straw hat.

Here we meet Mrs. Ruth who is 47 yeras old.  Several years ago her husband passed away and she was left alone with her three children who are now adults.  Two of them still live at home and work.

She runs a grocery store in her house and also sells bazaar items and ice cream.  She works every day from 6:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. and also prepares and sells lunches.  She says considerable customers come for her delicious meals every day but weekends are when sales are at their highest.  She buys the products for her store in Manta.  Some are delivered to her store.  She has been in business for three years and it is going quite well.

This loan is to buy products such as rice, sugar, canned goods, detergent, meat, fish, etc., some of which are also used to prepare food.  She's been a member of the communal bank since it was founded, acting as its treasurer, and enjoys the group's close relationship.

Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, canned goods, detergent, meat, fish, etc.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna tiene 58 años, es casada y vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo y su nieto de 10 años. Casi toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura y ganadería, actividad que lo ha practicado su familia durante muchos años. Es así que la experiencia que tiene le ha dado la ventaja de mejorar sus cultivos ya que siembra papa y maíz. Por otro lado, cada día más se intensifica en la ganadería y actualmente cría vacas, carneros y chanchos y lo vende de manera ocasional mientras espera el momento de que debe cosechar y venderlos a los comerciantes de la ciudad más cercana a su  comunidad. De esta manera logra tener los ingresos para su familia, además que su esposo lo ayuda en esta tarea que en ocasiones requiere de mucho esfuerzo. Es su veinteavo crédito que tiene con MFP, se alegra de ser parte de su banco comunal  y aunque en la actualidad es un grupo reducido puede confiar en cada uno de ellos porque son sus amigos. Con el crédito que solicita,  lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono para sembrar papa y maíz.
texts.en:
Reyna is 58 years old, married and lives in her own house with her husband and 10-year-old grandson.  For almost all of her life she and her family have been in agriculture and livestock farming.  Her expertise has given her the advantage of improving her crops which are potatoes and corn.  She is also spending more and more time with her livestock farming and is now raising cows, sheep and pigs which she sells while waiting for the harvest season to arrive so she can sell produce in nearby cities.  This is how she makes an income for her family.  Sometimes her husband lends a hand when an extra effort is needed.

This is her 28th loan through MFP.  She is happy to be a part of the communal bank because, although it is not a large group, she can confide in everyone because they are friends.  

She plans to use the loan to buy sacks of fertilizer for the potato and corn crops.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Melva Nelly

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Esperanza y Progreso se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Melva, Tiene 45 años de edad y está casada, fruto de esta relación tiene cinco hijas de 20, 19, 16, 14 y 10 años, todas sus hijas estudian en Universidad, colegio y escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica.

Es una muy buena ama de casa que para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar vende productos de Avon y Yanbal (productos de belleza, perfumería, cosméticos y accesorios), trabaja todos los días sobre todo por las tardes, ya que en las mañanas está vendiendo ropa americana negocio que empezó muy recientemente y que le está dejando muy buenas ganancias, ella entrega todos sus productos a crédito y  cobra cada quince días.

Este crédito es para comprar cremas, perfumes, bisutería, ropa americana y otros productos. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 13 ciclos y le gusta por los beneficios y por la ayuda que les brinda la Fundación Espoir, ella se desempeña como fiscal de pagos del Banco.
 
Su sueño es llegar a ser una gran empresaria.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Esperanza y Progreso" meets every two weeks in the Montecristi Canton, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and crafts and renown both nationally and internationally.  It is the place of the famous "panama" straw hat.

Here we meet Mrs. Melva, who is 45 years old and married.  She has five daughters, ages 20, 19, 16, 14 and 10, who are all either in college, highschool or gradeschool.  Her husband works in a factory.

She is a good homemaker and helps her husband with the household expenses by selling Avon and Yanbal (beauty products, perfume, cosmetics and accessories).  She works every day in the afternoons since she sells American clothing in the morning.  She began this business recently but making a good income from it.  She delivers the products on a credit basis and collects payment every two weeks.

This loan is to buy creams, perfumes, costumer jewelry, American clothing and other products.  She has been in the communal bank for 13 terms and enjoys the benefits and support received from the Espoir Foundation.  She acts as Collections clerk at the bank.

Her dream is to be an important businesswoman.

loans.use: To buy creams, perfumes, costume jewelry, American clothing, etc.

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal”MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana María; la socia tiene 54 años D. edad, es casada y tiene 5 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. productos D. belleza como cremas, champu, colonias, perfumes entre otros, la socia es consultora D. las líneas D. belleza Avon, Esika y Unique, a la vez la socia tiene su salón D. belleza donD. realizan modernos cortes D. cabello, coloraciones y manicure, la socia se siente feliz ya que este trabajo le gusta mucho y saca  a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. mas productos D. belleza para así D. esta manera tener variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota
texts.en:
Juana María is a member of the "María Elena Moyano" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Juana Maria is 54 years old, married, and has 5 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling beauty products including creams, shampoo, cologne and perfume.  She is a consultant for Avon, Esika and Unique brand beauty products.  Juana María also has a beauty salon where she offers customers modern haircuts, hair coloring and manicures.  She feels happy because she really enjoys her work and it gets her family ahead in life.

Juana María is requesting this loan to buy more beauty products so that she can offer her customers more variety.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products so that she has a better variety to offer her customers

loans.name: German Antonio

texts.es: Germán Antonio se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, su forma de vender es ambulante. Tiene un hijo menor de edad a su cargo, pues para él ha sido muy satisfactorio obtener un medio de vida y mantener a su familia. Inicio este medio de vida por su Papa quien le enseño a sobrevivir con este negocio, la mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan con mayor demanda de electrodomésticos, ropa, calzado, cosméticos. Es por eso que solicita su financiamiento que es para la compra de materia prima. Sueña con establecer una tienda en donde ofrezca diferentes productos.
texts.en: Germán Antonio's business is selling general merchandise.  He has been in this business for more than three years and makes his sales in an itinerant manner.  He has one child in his care.  It has proven very satisfactory for him to be able to earn a living and support his family.  He started out in this line of work as his dad taught him to survive with this business.  Most of his customers are demanding more and more electrical appliances, clothes, footwear and cosmetics.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan so that he can buy goods.  His dream is to set up a store where he can sell different products.

loans.use: to buy small electrical appliances, clothes, footwear and cosmetics

loans.name: Monserrate

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Esperanza y Progreso se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

La señora Monserrate es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque sus amigas son muy unidas. Tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos, dos de los cuales ya son mayores de edad y la última de 17 años de edad la misma que este año empieza a estudiar en Universidad, dos de sus hijos viven en su casa.  Su esposo es maestro albañil.

Ella se dedica a lavar ropa ajena pero también se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta. Trabaja los fines de semana  desde las 9h00 hasta las 13h00, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada ocho  días, cobra  y al mismo momento realiza nuevas ventas. Su mercadería la compra en  Guayaquil y nos cuenta que lleva tres años que se dedica a esta actividad y que con esto ha podido ayudar a su hija para que siga con sus estudios.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. 

Su sueño es ver que su hija termine sus estudios y  que sea profesional.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the 'Esperanza y Progreso' (Hope and Progress) community bank meets in Montecristi canton.  This area is known both nationally and internationally for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts.  It is the home of the famous Panama hat.

Monserrate is a founding member of the community bank and she likes being a member because her friends are all very united.  Monserrate is 48 years old, married, and has three children.  Two of her children are grown up and her youngest daughter is 17.  This year she will start University.  Two of Monserrate's children still live at home.  Her husband is a master builder.

Monserrate washes other people's clothes but she is also a saleswoman.  She sells all types of clothes and makes her sales door to door.  She works on weekends, from 9.00am to 1.00pm, leaving her goods with her customers on credit.  She collects payment every week and, at the same time, makes new sales.  Monserrate buys her merchandise in Guayaquil.  She tells us that she has been in this business for three years and it has enabled her to help her daughter continue with her studies.

Monserrate will use this loan to buy more merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothes.  Her dream is to see her daughter finish her studies and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothes

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal”MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dionicia; la socia tiene 55 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de carpintería ella realiza las maderitas para los sellos y lo distribuye a las imprentas con las que trabaja ,a la vez exporta para las ciudades de Puerto Maldonado y Quillabamba, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le gusta mucho y de paso le trae muchas satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia sale en la foto con su nieta de su hija mayor.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de material para su negocio (madera).

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Dionicia is a member of the "María Elena Moyano" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Dionicia is 55 years old, lives with her partner, and has 4 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her carpentry business.  She makes the wooden parts for stamps which she distributes to the printing companies with which she does business.  She also exports her products to the cities of Puerto Maldonado and Quillabamba.  She has been in this business for years and enjoys her work a lot.  It brings her a lot of financial and personal satisfaction.  Dionicia appears in the photo with her granddaughter (her eldest daughter's child).
