Dionicia is requesting this loan to buy material for her business (wood).  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy material for her business (wood)

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor tiene 42 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en una casa alquilada. Hace más de 35 años se dedica a la agricultura, asimismo se dedica en la venta de leña al por mayor, actividad que lo realiza junto con su esposo, en donde ambos adquieren el tronco para seleccionarlos y luego vender en puntales y en leña. Considera que este trabajo requiere de mucha fortaleza física para cortar la madera, pero aún así esta contenta con este negocio ya que le es rentable. Tiene planes de expandir su negocio en otras ciudades para lo cual se esforzará en aumentar su capital de trabajo. Es su crédito número 8 que tiene con MFP, considera que su grupo es un equipo solidario y muy unido y se siente  muy contenta por ello y es esta la razón que la motiva a seguir esforzándose para mantenerlos unidos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más tronco al por mayor, esto ayudará bastante al crecimiento de su capital.
texts.en: Flor is 42 years old and lives with her husband and 2 children in a rented home.  For the past 35 years, she has worked in agriculture while at the same time selling wholesale firewood with her husband.  The two of them buy a full trunk then cut it up to sell it as posts and firewood.  This work requires a lot of physical strength to cut the wood, but she is very happy with her profitable business.  She has plans to expand the business to other cities which will require her to increase her working capital.  This is her 8th loan through MFP and she believes that her lending group is a unified team; she feels very happy in her group and it motivates her to work hard to keep them united.  She will use the loan to invest in buying more trunks wholesale which will help her to increase her working capital.

loans.use: to purchase trunks of wood.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: Francisco Javier R.:de 32 años de edad casado tiene 2 hijos los dos estudian,el es una persona muy trabajador ya que desde muy pequeño su papa le enseño el trabajo del comercio y hace 2 años inicio con su negocio propio el tiene un local de ropa nueva en el cual vende pantalones para dama y caballero blusas,chumpas,etc, el prestamo que el nececita es para comprar ropa nueva por mayor y surtir mejor su local para darles un mejor servicio un mejor servicio a sus clientes y obtener mejores ganancias su sueño es expandir su negocio y darles la la mejor educacion a sus hijos.
texts.en: Francisco Javier R. is 32 years old with 2 children who are both school-aged.  He is a very hard working person whose father taught him how to be a salesman from his youth.  Two years ago, he started his own business selling new clothing; he sells men's and women's pants, blouses, sweaters, etc.  He will use the loan to buy new clothes at wholesale to better supply his shop and give better service to his customers.  This will help him to improve his earnings.  His dream is to expand his business to provide a better education for his children.

loans.use: to purchase new clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Teofilo; él tiene 56 años de edad, casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio lleva ya un buen tiempo trabajando como promotor de un jardín particular por el centro de la ciudad trabajando en familia conjuntamente con su esposa e hija siendo la hija la docente del jardín y la mama juntamente con su esposo, el socio es una persona bien alegre con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia que son lo más importante que tiene , el socio sale en la foto con dos de sus nietas.

El socio solicita el préstamo para el mejoramiento del jardín como en la ampliación del patio del jardín.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Teofilo belongs to the Maria Elena Moyano village bank which is located in the Cusco district of the Cusco province in the department of Cusco.

He is 56 years old, married with 3 children.  For quite some time, he has worked as a developer of a garden in the city center.  He works together with his wife and daughter as his daughter is the garden docent.  Teofilo is a very happy person with a great desire to improve the life of his family which is the most important thing in his life.  He appears in the photo with 2 of his grandchildren.

He is seeking the loan to improve the garden by expanding the garden patio.

He is happy to receive the loan and promises to repay it on time.

loans.use: to improve the garden by expanding the garden patio.

loans.name: Digna

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Esperanza y Progreso se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Digna, ella tiene 79 años y hace varios años quedo viuda pero de esa relación tuvo 11 hijos, en la actualidad ya todos son mayores de edad, una de sus hijas vive en su casa. Está en el Banco comunal hace 21 ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que ha recibido en todos estos años que ha estado en el.

Tiene un kiosco donde vende ceviches y encebollados, platos muy apetecidos por los habitantes de la ciudad y del país en sí. Trabaja con la ayuda de su hija todos los días  desde  las 6h00 hasta las 15h00 o hasta que se termine lo que preparo, nos cuenta que tiene muchos clientes que la prefieren por la sazón que le pone a sus platos.  También vende gaseosas, aguas, jugos y cervezas. En la actualidad está por poner en su negocio la venta de sanduches y batidos de fruta para tener más variedad.
 
Este crédito es para comprar dos licuadoras para este nuevo negocio, pescado, yuca, colas, aguas, cervezas, etc.

Sus sueños son tener un gran negocio y seguir creciendo más con el pasar de los días.
texts.en:
Every two weeks the 'Esperanza y Progreso' (Hope and Progress) community bank meets in Montecristi canton.  This area is well known both nationally and internationally for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts.  It is the home of the famous Panama hat.

Here we meet 79 year-old Digna.  Several years ago, Digna became a widow but she has 11 children from her relationship.  All of her children are now grown up and one of her daughters lives with her.  Digna has been a member of her community bank for 21 loan cycles and she likes it because of the help that she has received over the years that she has been a member.

Digna has a stall where she sells 'ceviche' (a seafood dish) and 'encebollados' (a traditional dish made from tuna, cassava, tomatoes and onion).  These meals are very popular with the inhabitants of this city and also with people elsewhere in the country.  Digna works every day with her daughter's help, from 6.00am to 3.00pm or until she has sold all of the food she has prepared.  She tells us that she has a lot of customers who are loyal to her business because of the flavor that she gives to her dishes.  Digna also sells soda, water, juices and beer.  She is currently about to start selling sandwiches and smoothies in order to offer her customers more variety.

Digna will use this loan to buy two blenders for this new business and also fish, cassava, coca cola, water, beer, etc.  Her dreams are to have an important business and to continue growing over time.

loans.use: to buy two blenders, fish, cassava, coca cola, water, beer, etc.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARÍA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Josefina; la socia tiene 62 años D. edad, es casada y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. compra y venta D. cerveza, a la vez cuenta con un restaurante que abre D. lunes a sábado brindando el servicio D. almuerzo este negocio se encuentra a lado D. su otro negocio ambos negocios lo administra y los saca adelante ya que mediante estos la socia educa a su hijo y pueD. brindarle una mejor clase D. vida. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. insumos para sus negocios.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota
texts.en:
Josefina is a member of the María Elena Moyano community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the Cusco province of Perú. 

Josefina is 62 years old, married and has a son. She splits her daily activities between the business of buying and selling beer, and running a restaurant, which is open Monday through Saturday and serves lunch. Josefina runs both businesses siD. by siD.. She tries to get ahead in these businesses so that she can educate her son and give him a better quality of life. 

Josefina requests a loan in order to buy supplies for her businesses. 

She is happy to receive this loan and commits to making timely payments.

loans.use: To purchase supplies

loans.name: Teresa Jesus

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARÍA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Teresa Jesus; la socia tiene 57 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias realizando manualidades en tela como manteles, servilletas entre otros más, la socia trabaja desde su casa para luego venderlo a sus clientes que pueden ser sus amistades, vecinos y familiares, la socia vende de forma independiente, la socia es profesora cesante de un colegio nacional, ella es una persona bien alegre y optimista con los deseos de continuar así adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio (telas) para asi tener mas variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
She is a member of the “Maria Elena Moyano” Communal Bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco. Her name is Teresa, and she is 57 years old, married, and has 3 children. Teresa alternates her daily activities, making hand-made cloth items, like tablecloths and napkins, among other things. Teresa works from her house, then sells to her customers, who may be her friends, neighbors, and acquaintances. She sells independently. Teresa is a former teacher at a national school. She is a very happy and optimistic person with the desire to continue forging ahead.

Teresa requests a loan to buy materials for her business, especially cloth, to have more variety to offer her customers. She is happy about the loan and promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: TO BUY MATERIALS FOR HER CLOTH-EMBROIDERING BUSINESS, TO HAVE MORE VARIETY TO OFFER HER CUSTOMERS

loans.name: Bertha Urbelinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARÍA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bertha Urbelinda ; la socia tiene 63 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía como carteras, porta pasaportes, chalecos entre otros siendo la misma socia que elabora estos diseños para poder venderlos de forma ambulatoria e independiente a sus familiares, amistades y vecinos, ella trabaja en su mismo domicilio también algunos clientes la buscan en su propio domicilio, la socia es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio como cierres, botones, hilos entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The member belongs to the MARÍA ELENA MOYANO communal bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district, part of Cusco Province and the department of Cusco.

The member’s name is Sra. Bertha Urbelinda, age 63. She is married and has 3 children. Bertha divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling handicrafts such as wallets, passport cases, and vests, among other things. She makes these items in order to be able to sell them independently and on an itinerant basis to relatives, friends, and neighbors. She works in her house, and some of her customers seek her out there. She is a very happy and enthusiastic person.

The member is applying for the loan in order to purchase materials for her business like zippers, buttons, and thread, among other things. She is happy about the loan and promises to make all the payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her business such as zippers, buttons, and thread, among other things.

loans.name: Yosip

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Yosip; él tiene 30 años de edad, soltero y tiene 1 hijo; el socio trabaja con el sector turismo él es guía oficial de turismo y ya lleva unos años ejerciendo su carrera ,el es una persona bien alegre, entusiasta y se siente feliz ya que trabaja realizando la actividad que a él le gusta, el trabaja en turismo de aventura guiando Camino Inca,Choquequirao,tours Machupicchu, Valle Sagrado y City Tours, el socio desea continuar trabajando para así poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra y renovación de algunos equipos de camping.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Maria Elena Moyano communal bank, located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, in Cusco department.

He is Yosip, 30, single, and he has 1 son.  He has worked in tourism as an official tourist guide for some years.  Yosip is a cheerful, enthusiastic person who feels happy working in what he likes.  He is an adventure guide on the Camino Inca (Inca Trail) for Choquequirao tours, in Machupicchu, the Sacred Valley and City tours.  He wants to continue working so that he can offer his son a better quality of life.

The member is requesting a loan to buy new and repair some camping equipment.

Yosip is happy with the loan and promises to make the payments in the established time period.

loans.use: To buy new and repair some camping equipment

loans.name: Larisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARÍA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Larisa; la socia tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza como perfumes,colonias,cremas entre otros la socia es consultora de la línea de belleza Esika,la socia le gusta mucho esta negocio ya que le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, a la vez la socia trabaja en un colegio nacional ella es profesora del nivel secundario, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio de venta de productos de belleza.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Larisa belongs to the communal bank "MARÍA ELENA MOYANO," located in the Cusco district of the province and department of Cusco. 

Larisa is 28 years old and is single.  She alternates her daily chores with her business selling beauty products such as perfumes, colognes, creams and other products.  She is a beauty consultant for the Esika brand.  She enjoys this business very much, since it brings her satisfaction both on an economic and personal level.  Larissa also works as a secondary school teacher in a public school.  She is a very cheerful person who has a strong desire to get ahead.

Larisa is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise for her beauty products business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan, and pledges to make all of her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her business selling beauty products

loans.name: Nancy Violeta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARÍA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nancy Violeta; la socia tiene 55 años de edad casada y tiene 3 hijos mayores; la socia se dedica al cuidado de su hogar ella es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta con muchas ganas de seguir adelante al cuidado de su familia y de sus hijos aunque estos ya sean profesionales, la socia siempre está al pendiente de ellos, a la vez la socia alquila habitaciones que tiene disponible en su casa siendo así que también la socia vive de sus rentas, la socia es una persona bien responsable con las ganas de seguir para adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para arreglar el piso de una de sus habitaciones.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Nancy Violeta, 55, is a member of the “MARÍA ELENA MOYANO” communal bank which is located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Cusco Department.

She is married and has three adult children.  She is a housewife and she is quite a cheerful and enthusiastic person with a strong drive to get ahead caring for her family and children. Even though they are already professionals, she is always watchful of them.

At the same time, she rents rooms that she has available in her house and she lives off this income.  She is a very responsible person with the desire to continue forward.

She is asking for a loan to repair the floor in one of her rooms.  She is happy with the loan and commits to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to repair the floor in one of her rooms.

loans.name: Maria Julieta

texts.es: Maria Julieta C. S.:de 36 años de edad es casada tiene 3 hijos los tres estan estudiando en una escuela publica,su negocio es de venta de ropa nueva lo inicio hace 4 años ella tiene un pequeño local a la orilla de la calle principal donde ella vive los vecinos ya la conocen y se asercan desde muy temprano para comprar su mercaderia el prestamo que ella solicita es para la compra de ropa nueva por mayor,su sueño es expandirse y abrir un nuevo local en el municipio de su localidad para poder obtener mejores ganancias y darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria Julieta C. S., 36, is married and has three children who go to public school.  Her business is new clothes sales.  She started it four years ago and she has a small locale along the main street where she lives.  Neighbors know her and come by from early in the morning to buy merchandise.

The loan she’s asking for is to buy new clothes at wholesale.  Her dream is to expand and open a new locale in her local town to get better profits and provide a better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy new clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Belgica Nieve

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Valle Verde. Esta localidad se la conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.
Z
En este lugar conocimos a la señora Belgica, tiene 46 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 8 hijos, 5 de ellos mayores de edad y tres de 12, 10 y 8 años los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela.
 
Ella tiene un pequeño comedor en San Jacinto frente al mar, en el cual prepara deliciosos platos, su especialidad son los mariscos y el pescado apanado con ensalada y patacones. Trabaja todos los días desde las 06h00 hasta las  17h00 con la ayuda de sus hijos. Nos cuenta que tiene su comedor hace año y medio y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado, plátano verde, yuca, mariscos y otros ingredientes para la preparación de los alimentos. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 5 ciclos y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos pudo empezar en su negocio y está muy agradecida por esto.

Su meta es sacar a sus pequeños hijos adelante.
texts.en:
The Valle Verde (Green Valley) communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Charapoto.  This locality is knows for its traditional culture and for being just a few minutes from two of the province’s best beaches: San Jacinto and San Clemente.

We met Bélgica, 46, here.  She is in a common law relationship and has 8 children.  Five of them are adults and the other three are 12, 10 and 8 years old and go to middle and elementary school.

She has a small eatery at the seashore in San Jacinto where she prepares delicious dishes.  Her specialty is seafood and breaded fish with salad and fried plantain.  She is open for business from 6am until 5pm every day; her children help her.  She tells us that she’s had the eatery for a year and a half and does very well. She will use the loan to buy rice, meat, fish, green plantain, manioc, seafood and other ingredients to prepare her dishes. 

She’s been in the communal bank for 5 cycles and she likes it because thanks to the loans she was able to start her business and she is very grateful for this.  Her goal is to see her younger children get ahead.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, fish, green plantains, manic, seafood, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk, cream, sour milk, cottage cheese, cheese and partly to buy corn, sorghum and wheat.

loans.name: Libia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARÍA ELENA MOYANO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Libia; la socia tiene 66 años D. edad casada y tiene 3 hijos mayores; la socia se dedica al cuidado D. su hogar y D. sus hijos aunque estos ya sean profesionales igual ella está pendiente D. ellos, la socia es una persona bien alegre y entusiasta con muchas ganas D. seguir adelante, ahora la socia desea construir su casa y junto a su esposo realizaran este sueño.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la construcción D. su casa. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota
texts.en:
Libia, 66, is a member of the “MARÍA ELENA MOYANO” communal bank located in Cusco District which belongs to Cusco Province, Cusco Department.

She is married and has three adult children.  She cares for her home and her children.  Even though they are professionals she still watches over them.  She is a very cheerful, enthusiastic person with much drive to get ahead.  She wants to build her house and together with her husband she will reach this dream.  She is asking for the loan to build her house.  She is happy with the loan and committed to repay.

loans.use: to build her house.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bernardina; la socia tiene 38 años de edad casada y tiene 4 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche, la socia también se dedica a la compra y venta de tarwi para después llevarlo a vender al mercado de Huancaro de Cusco los días de feria sabados, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar la tienda de abarrotes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Bernardina, 38, is a member of the “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA” communal bank located in the community of Yuncaypata which belongs to Cusco Province, Cusco Department.

She is married and has four children.  She alternates her daily chores with running a grocery store.  She sells basic need items like: rice, sugar and milk.  She’s also a tarwi (an Andean legume) merchant in Cusco’s Huancaro market on Saturdays.  She is a very cheerful person who very much wants to get ahead with her family.

She is asking for the loan to stock her grocery store.  She is happy about the loan and committed to repaying her installments.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana; la socia tiene 33 años de edad casada y tiene 5 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura ella siembre lo que son papas,trigo,cebada entre otros para luego venderlos en las ferias que se realizan los días sábados en el mercado de hunacaro por el centro de la ciudad, la socia lleva años en esta actividad el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales ella se siente muy feliz con su trabajo siendo de esta manera que ella saca a sus hijos adelante. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes, abono, semillas entre otros para seguir sembrando sus productos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank, "VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA", which is located in the Yuncaypata community in the province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Ana is 33 years old and has five children.  She alternates her daily activities with growing crops such as potatoes, wheat and barley, among others.  She sells her produce at the Saturday market in Hunacaro in the city center.  She has been involved in this activity for several years and it has brought her considerable economic as well as personal satisfaction.  She enjoys her work which is a way to provide for her children.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds so she can continue growing crops.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds to continue growing crops

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Clotilde; la socia tiene 44 años de edad casada y tiene 4 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura ella siembre lo que son papas,trigo,cebada entre otros para luego venderlos en las ferias que se realizan los días sábados en el mercado de hunacaro por el centro de la ciudad a la vez la socia cuenta con un carrito que brinda el servicio de taxi el cual lo maneja su esposo todos los días por las mañanas ,la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia,la socia sale en la foto con su ultima hijita.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes, abono, semillas entre otros para seguir sembrando sus productos y para comprar algunos accesorios para su carrito.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank, "VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA", which is located in the Yuncaypata Community in the province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Clotilde is 44 years old, married and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with her farm activity growing potatoes, wheat and barley, among others.  She sells her produce at the Saturday market in Hunacaro in the city center.  She also has a car that her husband uses every morning to offer taxi service.  The member is cheerful and very intent on helping her family get ahead.  She is pictured here with her youngest daughter.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds to continue growing crops and to buy car accessories.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds to continue growing crops and to buy car accessories

loans.name: Biviana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN D. YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad D. Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Biviana; la socia tiene 56 años D. edad casada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura ella siembra lo que son papa y ,trigo, entre otros para luego venderlos en las ferias que se realizan los días sábados en el mercado D. huancaro por el centro D. la ciudad, a la vez la socia se dedica al cuidado D. sus hijos y D. su hogar ya que sus hijos aun son pequeños y están en colegio ella se encarga D. prepararles su almuerzo alistarles sus cosas para su colegio siendo así que la socia saca a sus hijos adelante ya que son lo más importante que tiene.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra D. fertilizantes, abono, semillas entre otros para seguir se sembrando sus productos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "VIRGEN DEL CARMEN D. YUNCAYPATA", which is located in the Yuncaypata Community in the province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Biviana is 56 years old, married and has two children.  She alternates her daily activities with growing crops such as potatoes and wheat, among others.  She sells her produce at the Saturday market in Huancaro in the city center.  She also is a homemaker and takes care of her children who are still young and in school.  She prepares lunch for them every day and gets them ready for school, doing all she can for them since they are what matters most to her.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds to continue grow crops.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds to continue growing crops

loans.name: Duo Lirio De San Bartolo Group

texts.es: Duo Lirio de San Bartolo:Flor de Maria:mas conocida como doña chinita,ella es muy conocida por su comunidad y se dedica a la venta de flores y frutas en el mercado de su comunidad todo los fines de semana los otros dias de la semana vende en el mercado de la capital ella nos comenta que que lleva esta rutina de negocio ya que ella se a ganado la vida desde mucho tiempo con la ayuda de su mama para sacar adelante a sus hermanos que estudian en la escuela,ella dece que apoya a su mama de esta manera ya que ella no tubo la oportunidad de estudiar y anhela lo mejor para sus hermanos ya que ella no puede tener hijos ella solicita este credito para la compra de frutas y verduras de la misma manera doña Paula A. que se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mismo mercado y ella nos comenta que lucha con su esposo que se dedica a la agricultura ella solicita este credito para la compra de frutas y verduras para surtir mejor su venta y asi tener mejores ganancias
texts.en:
This is the Duo Lirio de San Bartolo group.

Flor de Maria, who is better known as Doña Chinita, is very well-known in her community.  Se sells flowers and fruits at the community market every weekend.  The other weekdays she sells in the market of the capity city.  She says she has been running this business for some time with help from her mother in order to provide for her brothers who are in school.  Since she didn't have the opportunity to study she decided to help her mother because she wants the best for her brothers as she cannot have children.  

She is requesting the loan to buy fruit and vegetables in the same way as Paula A. who sells fruit and vegetables at the same market and works together with her husband, who is a farmer, to get ahead.  She is requesting a loan to buy fruit and vegetables to have more variety and increase sales and income.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Ida

texts.es: Ida tiene 51 años, vive con uno de sus hijos en una casa que les pertenece a unos familiares lejanos y por el cual ella es la encargada de cuidar dicha casa. Tiene 20 años de experiencia en la agricultura y en todo este tiempo se ha dedicado a la siembra, asimismo recibe la ayuda de su hijo, quien la ayuda en la organización y en el contrato con los jornaleros que se encargaran en la siembra y cosecha, así como la compra o alquiler de  yunta y/o tractor, dependiendo  de las condiciones de su terreno. Una vez cosechada sus plantaciones los vende al por mayor en el mercado de su localidad y de esa manera obtiene bueno ingresos. Por otro lado, toma tiempo para cosechar así que se dedica a vender yogurt, que es comprado al por mayor en una fábrica de productos lácteos.  Actualmente esta concentrada en planificar su próxima cosecha. Es su crédito número 10 que tiene con MFP, se siente muy contenta de tener un espacio de amistad en su banco comunal además de ser personas responsables que  trabajan de manera armoniosa y en equipo de la cual se siente muy agradecida. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono, fertilizantes, asimismo desea comprar algunas ovejas.
texts.en:
Ida is 51 years old and lives with her children in a house that belongs to distant relatives but is under her care.  She has been in farming for 20 years and has always grown crops.  She also receives assistance from her son who helps organize and contract workers for the planting and harvest seasons, and arrange purchase or rental of a plough or tractor, depending on the land's condition.  After harvest she sells her produce wholesale at the local market and obtains a good income.

She also sells yoghourt that she buys wholesale at a dairy products factory.  She is currently focused on planning for the upcoming harvest.  This is her 10th loan through MFP and she is very happy to have a circle of friends at the communal bank where people are not only responsible individuals but also work well as a team, for which she is grateful.

She plans to use the loan to buy sacks of fertilizer and some sheep.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer and sheep

loans.name: Maura Benedicta

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Valle Verde. Esta localidad se le conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

La señora Maura es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que les brinda el banco. Tiene 43 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de  la cual tiene dos hijos de 18 y 9 de edad los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella es un ama de casa que le gusta trabajar y ganarse la vida honradamente, tiene a su cargo el bar de una escuela en su localidad, en este bar ella vende productos elaborados (papas fritads, chifles, golocinas, etc.), bocadillos (sanduches, pitza, etc.) y  almuerzos tanto para  los estudiantes como para los profesores. Trabaja de lunes a viernes, desde las 6h00 hasta las 14h00.  Además en los feriados también se va a San Clemente  a vender comida para los turistas que llegan a la playa en esas temporadas.

Este crédito es para surtir su bar y para comprar productos para preparar los alimentos.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa bien acabada.
texts.en:
The Valle Verde communal bank meets every fifteen days in the city of Charapoto.  This city is known for its traditional culture, and also for being a few minutes away from two of the best beaches in the province: San Jacinto and San Clemente.

Maura is the founding member of the communal bank, and she appreciates the help that the bank offers to the members.  She is 43 years old, is in a common-law marriage, and has two children, ages 18 and 9; her children are both in school.  Maura’s husband is a merchant.

Maura likes to work and make an honest living.  She runs the snack bar at a local school, where she sells processed foods (potato chips, plantain chips, sweets, etc.), snacks (sandwiches, pizza, etc.), and lunches to both students and teachers.  Maura works Monday to Friday from 6 in the morning until 2 in the afternoon.  During the holidays she also goes to San Clemente, where she sells food to the tourists who visit the beach that time of year.

This loan will be used to restock Maura’s snack bar and to purchase ingredients for preparing meals.

Maura’s dream is to have a fully finished house.

loans.use: Purchasing processed floods, snacks, and general supplies

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hilaria; la socia tiene 41 años de edad casada y tiene 6 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de productos como kinua y tarwi ella compra estos productos del distrito de Pisaq para luego venderlos en las ferias sabatinas del mercado de Huancaro por el centro de la ciudad, la socia es una persona bien alegre ella ahora desea construir su casita con el apoyo de su esposo lograran este sueño.

La socia solicita el préstamo para aumentar su capital para la construcción de su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Hilaria is a member of the "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata" community bank which is located in Yuncaypata community, in Cusco province and department.

Hilaria is 41 years old, married, and has 6 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying and selling products such as quinoa and tarwi (a native bean).  She buys these products in Pisaq district and then sells them in the Saturday street markets which are held at Huancaro market, in the city center.  Hilaria is a very cheerful woman who would like to build her own small house.  With the support of her husband, she will achieve this dream.

Hilaria is requesting this loan to increase her capital so that she can build her house.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to increase her capital to build her house

loans.name: Estefania

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Estefania; la socia tiene 46 años de edad casada y tiene 7 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura sembrando papa,maiz,cebada entre otros esta actividad la socia lleva años realizando el cual le va bien ya que mediante esto la socia saca a sus hijos adelante conjuntamente con su esposo trabajan en su chacra para así poder tener más productos que cocechar para ser vendidos en las ferias sabatinas del mercado de Huancaro ubicado por el centro de la ciudad, la socia también está dedicada a su hogar al cuidado de sus hijos y se siente feliz ya que sus hijos son lo más importante que tiene.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes, abono y semillas para su chacra.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Estefania is a member of the "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata" community bank which is located in Yuncaypata community, in Cusco province and department.

Estefania is 46 years old, married, and has 7 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and farming.  She grows potatoes, corn, barley and other crops.  Estefania has been in this business for years and it is going very well as, through her work, she is able to get her children ahead in life.  She works on her farm together with her husband so that they can have more products to harvest and sell in the Saturday street markets which take place at Huancaro market, in the city center.  Estefania also looks after her children at home and feels happy since her children are the most important thing she has.

Estefania is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers, manure and seeds for her farm.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure and seeds for her farm

loans.name: Mujeres Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Jesus Elvira, forma parte del grupo "Mujeres Triunfadoras" desde hace casi dos años. Tiene una hijita de meses quiene es el motor y motivo de superación, por ella se esfuerza muchísimo en desempeñar lo mejor posible su trabajo.
Ella se dedica a la confección y estampado de polos, inició con una maquina de coser preparando pequeñas cantidades para ofrecerlo a la venta,hoy en día ella puede colocar sus prendas en centros comerciales de mucha concurrencia aumentando ahora el servicio de estampado, lo cual le genera un poco mas de ingresos.
Con el prestamo solicitado compró los materiales necesarios para iniciar su trabajo de estampado de polos.
texts.en:
Jesus Elvira has been a member of the "Mujeres Triunfadoras" (Triumphant Women) group for almost two years.  She has a young daughter, who is only months old, who is the driving force and motivation behind her desire to get ahead.   For her daughter's sake, she works very hard indeed to carry out her work as well as she can.  Her business is making clothes and printing polo shirts.  She started out with a sewing machine, making small quantities to offer for sale.  She is now able to place her garments in very busy shopping centers.  Jesus is increasing her shirt printing service which makes her a little more money. 

Jesus used the loan she requested to buy the materials she needed to start work printing polo shirts.

loans.use: to buy supplies needed to make and print polo shirts

loans.name: Agripina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Agripina; la socia tiene 45 años de edad casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura sembrando papa,maiz,cebada entre otros esta actividad la socia lleva años realizando esta actividad ,a la vez la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de productos como tarwi y kinua ella compra en el distrito de Pisaq su mercadería para luego venderlo en el mercado de Huancaro en la feria sabatina que se realiza, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes, abono y semillas para su chacra.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata in the province of Cusco, and the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Agripina. She is 45 years old, married, and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with her agriculture business, harvesting potatoes, corn, wheat and other products. She has many years in the business. She also buys and sells products such as tarwi beans and quinoa seeds. She makes her purchases in the district of Pisaq and she later resells them in the market in Huancaro at the fair they hold on Saturdays. She is a very happy person and she is very eager to keep working for the sake of her family.

She requests a loan to purchase fertilizers and seeds for her fields.

She is happy for her loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds for her plantation

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Basilia; la socia tiene 44 años de edad casada y tiene 5 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura sembrando kinua y maíz para luego venderlo en el mercado de ttio ubicado por el centro de la ciudad de Cusco, esta actividad la socia lleva años realizando y mediante esto la socia saca a sus hijos adelante ahora la socia está queriendo terminar de construir su casita y espera poder concluir este sueño.

La socia solicita el préstamo para aumentar a su capital para poder terminar de construir su casita.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata in the province of Cusco, and the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Basilia. She is 44 years old, married, and she has 5 children. She alternates her daily activities with her agriculture business, harvesting quinoa and corn. She later sells her products at the Ttio market, located in the downtown area of Cusco. She has many years in the business and this is how she is able to provide for her kids. She wants to finish building her house and she hopes to be able to attain her dream.

She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to finish building her house

loans.name: Verónica Johanna

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Valle Verde. Esta localidad se le conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Verónica, tiene 26 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 8 y 2  años de edad, el mayor estudia en escuela. El marido es agricultor y comerciante.
 
Es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de productos de Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana. Ella comparte el crédito con su esposo, el se dedica a la agricultura y a la compra y venta de pollos y chanchos.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos, chanchos y pollos. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta todo del banco.
 
Sus sueños son tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the members of the "Valle Verde" (Green Valley) community bank meet in the city of Charapoto.  This city is known for its traditional culture and for the fact that it is located only a few minutes from two of the best beaches in the province: San Jacinto and San Clemente.

Here we meet 26 year-old Verónica who lives with her partner and has two children aged 8 and 2.  Her eldest child attends elementary school.  Her husband is a farmer and a salesman.

Verónica is a housewife who, in order to make her own income, sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and ladies' accessories).  She works three days a week, leaving her products on credit and collecting payment every week.  She will share her loan with her husband who farms and also buys and sells chickens and pigs.

This loan will be used to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, pigs and chickens.  This is Verónica's third loan cycle as a member of her community bank and she likes everything about her community bank.  Her dream is to own her own home.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, pigs and chickens

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Sergio; él tiene 49 años de edad, casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio es maestro constructor el trabaja en las distintas obras que se realizan como parques, construcciones edificios, casas, condominios entre otros el socio lleva años en esta actividad ya que mediante su trabajo el saca a sus hijos adelante, le socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir trabajando por sus hijos para así brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra y de herramientas de trabajo como wincha, martillo eléctrico entre otros.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. 

His name is Sergio. He is 49 years old, married, and he has 3 children. He is a master builder and he works at various projects such as parks, buildings, houses, condominiums and others.  He has many years in the business and this is how he is able to support his children. He is a very happy person and he is very eager to keep working for the sake of his children and to provide them with a better quality of life.

He requests a loan to purchase working tools such as a measuring tape, a nail gun, and others.

He is happy for his loan and he is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to purchase working tools such as a measuring tape and a nail gun

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Avelina; la socia tiene 41 años de edad casada y tiene 5 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende diferentes productos como arroz,azúcar,leche,aceite,gaseosas,chocolates entre otros ,a la vez la socia vende hierbas medicinales a sus clientes especialmente en el mercado de huancaro en las ferias sabatinas ,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le gusta mucho ya que mediante este la socia saca a sus hijos adelante.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar  más mercadería para su tienda de abarrotes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Avelina. She is 41 years old, married, and she has 5 children. She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business. She sells a variety of products such as rice, sugar, milk, cooking oil, soft drinks, chocolates, etc. She also sells medicinal herbs to her clients, especially at the market in Huancaro during the Saturday fairs. She has many years in the business and she enjoys it very much, especially because this is how she is able to support her children.

She requests a loan to purchase more merchandise for her grocery store business.

She is happy for her loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her grocery store business

La socia es la Sra. Delia; la socia tiene 23 años de edad casada y tiene 2 hijos; la socia se dedica a la agricultura siembra lo que son papa, maiz, cebada y habas la socia lleva años en esta actividad conjuntamente con su esposo, la socia a la vez es ama de casa está al cuidado de sus hijos, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de abono y semillas para su chacra.

She has many years in the business, working together with her husband. She is a very happy person and she is very eager to keep working for the sake of her family.

She requests a loan to purchase fertilizers and seeds for her fields.

She is happy for her loan and she is committed to making her payments.

Abelina; la socia tiene 59 años de edad casada y tiene 5 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas y chanchos, la socia lleva años realizando este negocio ella cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes especialmente a los restaurantes que son los que más piden pero también tiene otros clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de alimento de sus animalitos como pasto, purina, maiz entre otros.

Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Abelina. She is 59 years old, married, and she has 5 children. She alternates her daily activities with her livestock business. She raises small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs. She has many years in the business and she raises these livestock for later resale to clients, especially to restaurants that offer the most demand, but she also sells to other clients who make requests. She is a very happy person and she is very eager to keep working for the sake of her family.

She requests a loan to purchase feed for her little animals, such as hay, kibble, corn and others. 

She is happy for her loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her livestock such as hay

loans.name: Epifania

La socia es la Sra. Epifania; la socia tiene 44 años D. edad casada y tiene 4 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. compra y venta  D. asnapa (hierbas) ella compra su mercadería en la provincia D. Urubamba para luego venderlo en las ferias sabatinas del mercado D. Rosaspata ubicado por el centro D. la ciudad ahí lleva toda su mercadería para venderlos a sus clientes, a la vez la socia se dedica a la agricultura ella siembra lo que son papa,maiz,trigo y cebada, la socia es una persona alegre y con muchas ganas D. salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para aumentar su capital para la construcción D. su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen D. Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Epifania. She is 44 years old, married, and she has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of buying and selling asnapa (an herb). She makes her purchases in the province of Urubamba to later resell at the Saturday fairs at the market of Rosaspata, located in the downtown of the city. She takes her merchandise there to sell to her clients. She also dedicates her time to agriculture, harvesting potatoes, corn, and wheat. She is a happy person and she is very eager to get ahead.

She requests a loan to increase her capital in order to build her house.

She is happy for her loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to finish building her house

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María; la socia tiene 20 años de edad conviviente y tiene 1hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura sembrando papa,maiz,cebada,trigo todo esto para su uso diario, la socia se dedica al cuidado de su casa y de su hijo ya que todavía es un bebe necesita los cuidados de su mama ,su esposo es quien trabaja y sustenta su familia él trabaja en una maderería de lunes a sábado siendo de esta manera que sale adelante con el apoyo de su pareja.

La socia solicita el préstamo para utilizarlo en su eso personal como abono para su chacra.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Maria. She is 20 years old, married common-law, and she has 1 child. She alternates her daily activities with her agriculture business, harvesting potatoes, corn, and wheat. All of these products are for their daily consumption. She is dedicated to the maintenance of her house and the care of her son, especially because he is still a baby and he needs his mother's care.  Her husband is the one who works and he earns the means to support the family. He works in a lumber yard from Monday to Saturday and this is the way he supports his family, with his partner’s support.

She requests a loan to use for personal expenses, such as the purchase of fertilizer for her fields.

She is happy with her loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her fields

loans.name: Purificacion

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Purificacion; la socia tiene 25 años de edad, separada y tiene 1 hijo; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanías (tejidos) como mantas, chompas,chalinas,guantes entre otros ella teje en su casa para luego venderlo a sus clientes, ella trabaja de forma independiente esto hace que tenga más tiempo para estar con su hijo esto es algo que le gusta mucho y le pone más esfuerzo a su trabajo, la socia es una persona responsable y de esta manera ella saca a su hijo adelante. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales como hilos, agujasa, lana entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Purificacion. She is 25 years old, separated, and she has 1 child. She alternates her daily activities with her knitting business. She knits wraps, sweaters, scarves, mittens and others. She knits at home to later sell to her clients. She works independently and this ways she is able to have more time for her son. This is something she really enjoys and she puts a lot of effort into her work. She is a responsible person and this is how she is able to provide for her son.

She requests a loan to purchase materials such as yarn, needles, wool and other materials.

She is happy for her loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase yarn, needles, and wool

loans.name: Mariana Del Socorro

texts.es: Mariana Del Socorro tiene 60 años, se dedica a una pulpería y venta de cajetas, vive con su hijo que es menor de edad. Es una persona muy trabajadora este negocio lo aprendió con el apoyo de sus padres fue así que poco a poco Mariana decide establecer su propio negocio y realizar  esta actividad. Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de dulces, bolsas, canela,vasos,leña, casuelas entre otros productos. Así  le da la oportunidad de estar preparada para atender la demanda. Su objetivo es crecer en el negocio y ayudar a su hijo para tenga todo lo necesario y también pueda iniciar ya sus estudios.
texts.en: Mariana del Socorro is 60 years old and she has a grocery store and she also sells caramel. She lives with her young son. She is a very hard working person and she learned this business with her parents’ help. This is how Mariana slowly established her own business and how she learned the work. She requests a loan to purchase sweets, bags, cinnamon, cups, firewood, cooking pots and other products.  This will help her become ready to meet the demand. Her goal is to make her business grow and to support her son so that he will have all that he needs and to be able to start school.

loans.use: to purchase sweets, bags, cinnamon, cups, firewood adn other products for her business

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; la socia tiene 32 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de semillas (eucalipto y duraznos) para venderlos a sus clientes que se encuentran en los distintos mercados de Cusco, la socia ahora no puede trabajar ya que esta al cuidado de su ultimo hijito que aun es bebe pero ella cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien es el que está a cargo de su familia, la socia es una persona alegre y con ganas de seguir adelante por sus hijos , una vez que su hijito crezca ella empezar nuevamente a trabajar.

La socia solicita el préstamo para emplearlo en sus gastos personales.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Luz Marina. She is 32 years old, married, and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of buying and selling seeds (eucalyptus and peaches). She sells to her clients who are found at the various markets in Cusco. She is currently unable to work because she is nursing her last little one who is still a baby. She depends on her husband’s support for the support of the family. She is a happy person and she is eager to get ahead for her sake of her children. Once her little one has grown she will start to work again. 

She requests a loan to use for personal expenses.

She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to provide for some personal needs

loans.name: Nino Salvador Group

texts.en: The communal bank "Nino Salvador" (Child Savior) is in its first loan cycle at FINCA Peru. Members of the bank have various businesses in Ayacucho, selling livestock (pigs and roosters), sweets, and groceries. Berta is the President of the bank. She is 37 years old and has three children who are all studying. She sells groceries at a small store here in Ayacucho. She used to sell groceries in the jungle outsiD. of the city, but recently moved. She will be using her loan of 1,000 PEN to purchase supplies to stock her store, such as sugar and rice. She has been a member of FINCA Peru, on and off, for ten years.

loans.use: To purchase supplies for grocery store, such as sugar and rice

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ubaldina; la socia tiene 36 años de edad, casada y tiene 7 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras se dedica a la agricultura, ella siembra lechuga para luego venderlo a sus clientes que se encuentran  en los mercados de Cusco a la vez la socia recoge hierbas de los campos ( hierbas medicinales) que también lo vende a sus mismos clientes, la socia es una persona bien alegre y responsable, ella trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo él es albañil y ambos sacan a  su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de abono, fertilizantes para su chacra.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". It is located in the community of Yuncaypata, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Ubaldina. She is 36 years old, married, and she has 7 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling vegetables. She is an agriculturist and she cultivates lettuce which is later sold to clients at the markets in Cusco. She also harvests herbs from the fields (medicinal herbs) and she also sells them to those same clients. She is a very happy person and she is responsible. She works together with her husband, a construction worker, for the support of the family.

She requests a loan to purchase fertilizers for her fields.

She is happy for her loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her fields

loans.name: Rosendo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA”; El banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Yuncaypata, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Rosendo; él tiene 43 años de edad, viudo; el socio es maestro constructor el trabaja en las distintas obras que se realizan y solicitan sus servicios ahora el trabaja de forma independiente y esto le permite tener más tiempo para hacer sus cosas, el socio lleva años en esta actividad el cual se siente tranquilo y feliz ya que realiza lo que le gusta y tiene muchas ganas de continuar trabajando en el futuro.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de una maquina  mezcladora para poder en el futuro alquilarlo.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosendo is a member of the "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata" community bank which is located in Yuncaypata community, in Cusco province and department.

Rosendo is 43 years old and widowed.  He is a master builder who works on different projects that are being carried out and request his services.  He works for himself and this allows him to have more time to do things.  Rosendo has been in this business for years and he feels relaxed and happy since he enjoys his work.  He has a great desire to continue working in the future.

Rosendo is requesting this loan to buy a cement mixer that he can hire out in the future.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy a cement mixer to hire out in the future

loans.name: Señor Del Calvario De Calca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR  DEL CALVARIO DE CALCA”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Marco Alejandro; el tiene 60 años de edad y es casado y tiene 6 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción como ladrillos, cemento, piedras, arena entre otros mas, él socio es profesor cesante y decidió invertir su dinero en este negocio el cual le esta yendo muy bien y trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa, él socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra  de materiales de construcción para así tener más variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.

Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, compra y venta de ropa para niños, venta de chicha de jora y una tienda de agroveterianaria.

El socio se siente feliz por el préstamo  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
These people belong to the "SEÑOR  DEL CALVARIO DE CALCA” community bank which is located in Calca, in Calca district, in Cusco department.

Marco Alejandro is a member of this group.  He is 60 years old, married, and has 6 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business selling construction supplies such as bricks, cement, stones, sand and other products.  He used to be a teacher and decided to invest his money in this business which is going very well.  He works together with his wife.  He is a very cheerful person who has a great desire to get ahead in life for his family's sake.

Marco Alejandro is requesting this loan to buy construction supplies so that he has a greater variety of products to offer his customers.

The other members of this group have businesses which include: running a grocery store, buying and selling children's clothes, selling 'chicha de jora' (a traditional, corn-based drink), and running a store selling agricultural and veterinary products.  Marco Alejandro feels happy to be receiving his loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies so that he has a greater variety of products to offer his customers

loans.name: Beteliana

texts.en:
Beteliana A. is from the village of Langcataon, Pangantucan, Bukidnon. She is 46 years old. Beteliana is married and has four adult children. To make a living, Beteliana owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) retail shop, where she sells items such as canned goods, snack foods, beverages, shampoo, soap, and bread in the local community. Beteliana has been engaged in her business for more than 15 years and earns approximately 9,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2008, Beteliana joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Beteliana has successfully repaid a previous loan of 16,000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to purchase additional inventory and as working capital. Beteliana is requesting a new loan of 13,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products such as canned goods, snack foods, and instant noodles. This loan will be Beteliana's sixth loan from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:
HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, snack foods, and instant noodles

loans.name: Cela

To make a living, Cela owns & operates a business offering tricycle transport services. Cela has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 1,500 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2011, Cela joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a new loan of 5000 PHP to purchase tires and other accessories. This loan will be her first loan from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from this investment to improve/expand her business. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches   covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase tires and other accessories for her transport vehicle

texts.en: Hing S. is 51 years of age and is a resident of Kompong Chhnang province. She was once a farmer but now produces pots to make a living.  She earns around $3 per day.   Hing S. is a widow -- her husband passed way a year ago because of illness.  Hing S. has three children, two are married and one is still under her responsibility. Hing S. would like to request a loan in order to buy a cart to help her sell her pots products.

loans.use: buy a cart to help her sell her products

loans.name: Samorn

texts.en:
Mrs. Samorn S. (pictured at her loom) is 50 years old.  Her husband, Mr. Duon Dem, is 51 years old.  They live in a village by the Mekong River approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. Samorn is a weaver and her husband is a fisherman.   They have been married since 1987 and have four children: three sons and one daughter --  one is a construction worker, one weaves silk at home, and the other two are in school.  

Samorn is asking for a loan of $800 to repair her family's house.

loans.use: To repair her house

loans.name: Nally

texts.en:
Nally is 42 years old and married with 1 child.  Nally runs a Sari-sari Store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like soap, groceries, etc to sell in her sari-sari store.Nally  has been in this business for 7 years and sells a variety of items such as sardines, milk, shampoo, sugar etc. 

In the future Nally would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To purchase items for her general store

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en: Visitacion is 57 years old and single. She works very hard to help her nephews with their school expenses. Visitacion runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase additional items for her general store. Visitacion has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as sardines, shampoo, curlers, candies, etc. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to pay for the purchase of additional items for her general store

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.en:
Leonor is 38 years old and married, with four children. All four children are in school, and Leonor works very hard to provide for them. 

Leonor runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines, and has requested a loan of PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy items like sardines, candies, groceries, etc. to sell in her store. Leonor has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, milk, soap, shampoo etc. 

In the future, Leonor would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosale

texts.en:
Rosale is 37 years old and married, with five children. Rosale works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines, and has requested a loan of PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like sugar, groceries, etc. to sell in her store.

Rosale has already repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for four years and also earns an income from entertainment (Videoke).

Rosale aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha is 54 years old and married, with four children. Juditha works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy items like sardines, groceries, etc. to sell in her store.

Juditha has already repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 19 years and also earns an income from ice cream making.

Juditha aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is 50 years old and married, with seven children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Jocelyn is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to buy piglets. Jocelyn has been raising pigs for 11 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of a dream: to repair her house.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 50 years old and the married parent of six children, five of whom are in school. She runs a RTW (clothing) business in the Philippines and is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marilou has been in this business for five years. She is requesting a loan of 13,500 PHP through NWTF to purchase clothing to sell. 

In the future, Marilou would like to send all of her children through school.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena S. is from the village of Kimanait, Pangantucan, Bukidnon. She is 37 years old. Lorena is married and has 1 infant child. To make a living, Lorena owns & operates a sari-sari (variety) retail shop, selling canned goods, snack foods, detergent, biscuits, shampoo, soap & beverages in the local community. Lorena has been engaged in her business for over 3 years and earns approximately 5000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2008, Lorena joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.  She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 10000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to purchase additional inventory & fund working capital for her business. 

Lorena is requesting a new loan of 8000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell, such as canned goods & beverages. This will be her 4th loan from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from this investment to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: purchase additional products to sell

Luz works hard to provide for her family. She has repaid five previous loans from NWTF and is currently requesting a loan of 13,000 PHP to buy more merchandise for her store. 

In the future, Luz aspires to send her child to school.
