His short-term goal is to establish a business that covers more area, assists more customers, and helps him improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase medicine and clothing to sell.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando, natural del distrito de Anco, tiene 26 años de edad, es un joven muy trabajador y esta a cargo del cuidado de su hijo Joseph de 01 año. Cumpliendo el rol de padre y madre; juntos viven en su propia casa en la comunidad seis de agosto anexo del distrito de Anco. Armando, empezó su aventura como agricultor desde muy niño en las tierras de sus padres. Su pasión  por el agro lo llevó a adquirir sus propias tierras en donde viene trabajando 06 años de manera independiente; y hasta el momento cultiva plantas de cacao y café obteniendo un total de 05 hectáreas de terreno. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes se encargan de extraer con mayor rapidez los frutos y de esa manera logra avanzar con mayor celeridad su trabajo. Se siente muy comprometido con su labor; porque  gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta el ver que los frutos de sus plantas le brindan una buena producción, generándole ganancias por cada kilogramo de producto vendido. Cuenta que la  estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque en estos meses abundan los insectos y las precipitaciones de las lluvias, impidiendo el rendimiento de su trabajo y perjudicando también sus plantaciones. El crédito solicitado es para la adquisición de plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar su producción. Este es su primer crédito con MFP esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. Agradece a la institución por concederle el préstamo. Con los  2,000 nuevos soles solicitados, comprará plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en:
Armando is 26 years old and a native of the Anco district.  He cares for his 10 year old son, Joseph, and is a hard worker.  He fills the role of mother and father and he and his son live together in their own home in the “6 de Agosto” section of Anco.  Armanto began his adventure as a farmer on his parents’ land when he was a boy.  His passion for agriculture took him to acquiring his own land, where he has been working independently for the six years.  He raises cacao, and coffee on 5 hectares.  During the harvest season he hires farm hands who pick the crops with great speed and he is able to get his work done efficiently.  He is very committed to his work because he sees that his efforts pay off when his plants produce a good crop, which generates income for every kilogram he sells.  He says that he does not really like the winters because there are many insects during that time and the rains impede his work and damage his plants.

He is asking for this loan of 2,000 PEN so he can buy cacao plants to plant and harvest their bounty in a short time.  He also wants to buy some more land so that he can increase his production.  This will be his first loan through MFP and he is prepared to make all of his payment on time.  He wants to apply for more loans in the future.  He is grateful to the institution for helping him get this loan.

loans.use: to buy more cacao plants

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras 4 Group

texts.en:
Yoselin is a borrower who lives in Santiago, Dominican Republic. She is the coordinator for her group, Mujeres Luchadoras (Fighting Women) 4, and her story is representative of those in her group and other Dominican and Haitian borrowers at Esperanza International.

Yoselin runs a successful “miscellaneous” store, mostly selling clothing and shoes. With this loan, she plans to purchase clothing, shoes, perfume, accessories, and jewelry to sell for a small profit to her friends and neighbors.

Yoselin and her long-term partner have five children and live in a simple home in Santiago, the second largest city in the Dominican Republic. Urban areas of the Dominican Republic are very overcrowded and can be rough, with no potable running water, frequent power outages (if one has power to begin with), and inadequate health care. 

This is Yoselin’s fourth loan with Esperanza International, and she hopes to continue taking out loans to grow her business and improve the home life of her family. With the profits, she hopes to buy a plot of land to build their home and to reinvest in her business.

Yoselin hopes to continue her dream as a businesswoman; she wants to have a very improved, big store. Thank you for lending to Yoselin and the Mujeres Luchadoras group!

loans.use: to buy shoes, clothes, accessories, jewelry, and perfume

loans.name: Fredys Arsenio

texts.es:
Fredis, reside en Concepción Batres departamento de Usulután, tiene 33 años de edad, vive con su familia, su esposa y un hijo de un año de edad, su esposa trabaja y él se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y como motorista de una moto taxi.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos para comercializar, ya que quiere ampliar su granja y la manera para hacerlo en comprando cerdos pequeños y dar seguimiento al crecimiento y alimentación de estos.
El quiere convertirse en comerciante mayorista, tener éxito en sus negocios y dar a su familia una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Fredis lives in Concepción Batres in the Usulután department. He is 33 years old and lives with his family, his wife and his one-year-old child. His wife works and he devotes his time to raising pigs and driving a motorcycle taxi.

Hi is currently seeking a loan to buy pigs to market, as he wants to expand his farm by purchasing piglets and monitoring their growth and feeding.

He wants to become a wholesaler, to succeed in his businesses and give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy inventory items

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es: Salvador R. H. de veintinueve años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia en el departamento de San Salvador. El posee un negocio cerca del parque Libertad donde vende y repara relojes, la zona es muy concurrida y es por eso que Salvador tiene mucha clientela, el vende relojes de buena calidad y la reparación que ofrece es muy duradera, es por eso que las personas lo prefieren; debido a esto Salvador ha tenido mucha más demanda y se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar más relojes y además partes de reparación como brazaletes, pilas, vidrios entre otros. Salvador es un buen padre de familia y un hombre trabajador y de esta forma quiere llevar a su hogar una seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Salvador R. H. is 29 years old and lives with his life partner and son in his own home, in San Salvador department.  Salvador owns a business near Libertad Park where he sells and repairs watches.  The area is very busy and, for that reason, Salvador has many customers.  He sells good-quality watches and his repairs are very long lasting.  For this reason, people prefer his business and he has a lot of demand.  Salvador decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL which would allow him to buy more watches and also parts for repairing watches including straps, batteries and glass.  Salvador is a good father and a hard-working man.  Through his work, he would like to bring his household financial security and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy straps, batteries and glass

loans.name: Mario Rene

texts.es:
Mario es un joven de 21 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su madre y hermanos, está soltero y es empleado desde hace un año en el pollo campestre, también es poseedor de una tienda la cual comenzó con ayuda de su madre, el horario de trabajo es rotativo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para compra mercadería para la tienda, ya que quiere darle potencia al negocio ofreciendo una amplia variedad de productos de consumo, creciendo con el negocio y teniendo otra entrada de ingreso para su familia.
Sus proyecciones con el negocio es cada día ir mejorándolo, tener mejores ingresos y ayudar a su familia en lo que sea posible.
texts.en:
Mario is a 21 year old young man.  He lives in El Transito in the department of San Miguel with his mother and his siblings.  He is single and has been working at a poultry farm for a year.  He also owns a store that he runs with his mother's help.  He has a rotating schedule.  

He is currently requesting a loan to buy merchandise for his store.  He wants to strengthen and grow his business and offer a wide variety of consumer products as well as have another source of income for his family.   His plans for his business are to continue improving every day, to increase his income and to help his family in whatever way he can.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Vitelio

texts.es:
Don Vitelio, tiene 62 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, es agricultor y vive con su esposa y una hija de 28 años de edad, todos trabajan en su hogar, y el realiza sus labores como agricultor desde muy joven, cuando su padre lo llevaba de compañía al campo, no tiene un horario fijo y actualmente necesita un préstamo para la inversión en la siembra que se aproxima.
Con los fondos del préstamo piensa comprar fertilizantes y preparar la tierra, con esta ayuda le dará continuidad al trabajo que por años ha realizado con mucha dedicación y aprecio.
Las aspiraciones de don Vitelio es tener un amplio terreno cultivado, recibir una buena cosecha y compartir con su familia.
texts.en:
Vitelio is 62 years old and lives in San Rafael Oriente, in San Miguel department.  He is a farmer and lives with his wife and 28 year-old daughter.  Everybody in his household works.  Vitelio has worked as a farmer since he was very young, when his father would take him along to the fields with him.  Vitelio doesn't work fixed hours.  He currently needs a loan to invest in his upcoming sowing season.

Vitelio plans to spend his loan money on buying fertilizers and preparing his land.  This help will give him continuity in his work which he has carried out for years with a lot of dedication and appreciation.

Vitelio's aspirations are to own a large plot of cultivated farmland, to have a good harvest and to share with his family.

loans.use: to buy manure for his crops

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs and concentrate to feed them with

loans.name: Mirna Ruth

texts.es:
Doña Mirna, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su madre y una hermana, está soltera y tiene 41 años de edad, es empleada desde hace dos años, trabajando de 8:00am a 5:00pm, actualmente solicita un préstamo para mejorar el techo de su vivienda, ya que se encuentra deteriorado y teme que llegue el invierno y cause algún accidente domestico.
Dicho préstamo solventara su necesidad y ayudara a mantener la vivienda en buenas condiciones, donde su familia pueda estar más segura y vivir en condiciones dignas.
texts.en:
Mirna lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department, with her mother and a sister.  She is 41 years old and single.  She has been working as an employee for two years.  She works from 8.00am to 5.00pm.

Mirna is currently requesting a loan to improve her roof since it is in a bad state of repair and she fears that when the winter comes it will cause a domestic accident.

This loan will cover Mirna's needs and will help her to keep her home in a good condition so that her family can live more safely and in decent conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials to fix her roof

loans.name: Clementina

texts.es:
Clementina forma parte del banco comunal “Barrio Alto”, perteneciente a la ciudad de San Fernando. Ella se dedica a vender abarrotes en un almacén que tiene ubicado en el patio de su casa, desde hace 5 años. Su mercadería la compra usualmente en supermercados mayoristas. 
Con éste préstamo comprará mercadería para abastecer su negocio. 
Ella vive junto a su esposo, uno de sus hijos y una sobrina. Su marido la ayuda en el traslado de mercadería. 
Su sueño es poder ampliar su almacén y comprar una máquina hielera para conservar las bebidas en buen estado. 
Clementina está muy contenta y agradecida del crédito otorgado por Fondo esperanza. Ella disfruta de las reuniones, ya que comparte con las demás socias y se siente muy a gusto. 
San Fernando es una ciudad ubicada en la región del Libertador General Bernardo O’higgins , zona centro de Chile. La actividad económica de la ciudad se basa principalmente en la agricultura (viñedos, cultivo de remolacha, frutales, tabaco, trigo y cultivo tradicional), la agroindustria (empresas exportadoras de frutas, conserveras, de lácteos, etc.) y el comercio.
texts.en:
Clementina is a member of the "Barrio Alto" communal bank in San Fernando.  She sells groceries from a small area that she has set aside on her patio, and has been doing this for five years.  She buys her merchandise from large grocery stores.

She will use the money from this loan to stock her business.  She lives with her husband, one of her children, and a niece.  Her husband helps her transport the merchandise.

Her dream is to be able to expand her store and buy an ice machine to keep the drinks cold.

Clementina is very happy and grateful with this loan through "Fondo Esperanza," and she enjoys the meetings because she shares with the other members and is very comfortable.

San Fernando is located in the "Libertador General Bernardo O’higgins" region of central Chile.  It's an agricultural area (vinyards,  beets, fruit, tobacco, wheat, and traditional crops), agro-industry  fruit exporters and milk processing), and business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood and metal sheets to reinforce her chicken farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing for resale

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
Maruja tiene 34 años, vive con sus 5 hijos y su esposo en su casa propia. Sus padres son agricultores y le enseñaron esta actividad desde muy niña y hoy se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos, que junto con su esposo y sus hijos se esfuerzan diariamente para lograr sus ingresos diarios levantándose desde muy temprano. Se siente satisfecho el ver desarrollar sus plantaciones, asimismo lleva a sus ovejas y vacas para que se alimenten de los pastizales que se encuentran en  el campo. Este trabajo es de todo los días y regresa en horas de la tarde para descansar muy temprano y empezar otra jornada más, Sin embargo hay días en que el clima baja su temperatura pero aún así continua trabajando ya que de eso depende la economía de su hogar. Tiene anhelos de seguir adelante, como el tener un establo grande y pueda abastecerse de forraje para sus animales y por tal seguirá esforzándose en el trabajo.Es su primer crédito número que tiene con MFP, acceder a esta oportunidad significa mucho para ella porque va a mejorar significativamente  en su actividad además de que tiene oportunidades de aprendizaje muy ventajosas para ella y su familia.
Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de semillas de papa y sacos de abono para su próxima campaña de siembra.
texts.en:
Maruja is 34 years old and lives with her husband and five children in their own home.  Her parents are farmers who taught her when she was a little girl and now this is her primary source of income.  She, her husband, and children work daily and rise very early in the morning.  She is satisfied to see her plants develop, as well as taking her cattle and sheep to graze in the fields near her home.  She does this all day, every day, and gets home late to rest and prepare to begin again the following day.  There are days when the weather gets cold but she continues to work because she depends on the income.  She has a desire to continue and to have a large fully stocked stable, and continue working hard.  This will be her first loan through MFP and this opportunity means a lot to her because it will significantly improve her activities and she will have the chance to learn things that will be advantageous to her family.

She will use the money from this loan to buy potato seed and sacks of fertilizer for her next crop.

loans.use: to buy potato seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Erick Eduardo

texts.es: Erick Eduardo G. M. de 22 años de edad, habita en casa propia con su madre, hermana y tía. Él es un joven emprendedor y creativo que día a día lucha por salir adelante  y poder ayudar a su familia a mejorar su situación económica que por el momento es muy difícil, así como seguir brindando el apoyo a su pequeña hermana  que se encuentra estudiando y sueña con verse convertida en una gran profesional. Erick posee un pequeño negocio de bisutería en el cual ofrece todo tipo de accesorios como: pulseras, anillos, collares, aretes, entre otros. Elaborados por Él mismo. Sus productos los comercializa en diferentes lugares en donde puede encontrar  a las personas demandantes de este tipo de artículos  como en Universidades, fiestas y  otros lugares  que son muy concurridos. Ubicado en el Municipio de Santa Ana,  Este Joven es muy conocido en la zona ya que se caracteriza por ser amable, con mucha creatividad y dedicación en su trabajo. Para él,  lo más importante es que sus clientes puedan encontrar lo que buscan en su negocio y salgan satisfechos con lo que él ofrece.  Gracias a su  carisma y empeño en su trabajo cada día los clientes lo prefieren más. Razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar los materiales necesarios  como: diferentes tipos de piedras, nylon, hilo, alambre, tenazas, y demás materiales que le permitan elaborar artículos más atractivos y variados para ofrecer a sus clientes y atraer a nuevos compradores que le permitan aumentar sus ventas y lograr obtener mejores ingresos que ayuden al sostenimiento de su hogar.
texts.en: Erick Eduardo G. M. is 22 years old. He lives in his own house with his mother, sister and aunt. He is an enterprising and creative young man who fights day to day to get ahead and be able to help his family to improve its financial situation, which is difficult at this time. He also wants to continue offering support to his little sister, who is in school and dreams of having a great career. Erick has a small business selling jewelry, in which he offers all types of accesories such as: bracelets, rings, necklaces, earrings and more. He makes these himself. He sells his products in different places where you can find people who have a demand for these items, such as colleges, festivals and other places where people congregate. In the town of Santa Ana, this young man is well known for being friendly, very creative, and dedicated to his work. For him, the most important thing is for his customers to find what they are looking for in his business and to be satisfied with what he offers. Thanks to his charisma and hard work, every day the customers prefer him more. For this reason, he is asking for this loan from INTEGRAL, to be able to buy the materials he needs, such as: differnt types of stones, nylon, thread, wire, pliers, and other materials that will alllow him to make more attractive and varied items to offer his customers and attract new buyers to allow him to increase his sales and obtain more income that will help him support his home.

loans.use: to make jewelry of all types such as: bracelets, rings, necklaces, earrings, and more.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, reside en Santa Elena, departamento de Usulután, tiene 36 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de ropa y productos de belleza, también semilla de marañón, ella vive con su esposo y tres hijos. El negocio lo inicio desde joven sin un horario establecido.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ropa y semilla de marañón, esta compra le ayudara a mantenerse en el negocio y brindar a los clientes la mercadería necesaria.
Su aspiración es montar un negocio estable, atender un buen número de clientes y estar en buenas condiciones con su familia.
texts.en:
36 year-old Teresa lives in Santa Elena, in Usulután department, with her husband and three children.  She sells clothes and beauty products, and also cashew nuts.  She started the business when she was young and doesn't work fixed hours.

Teresa is requesting a loan to buy clothes and cashew nuts.  This purchase will help her to keep her business running and provide her customers with the merchandise they need.

Teresa's aspiration is to have a stable business, to serve a good number of customers and to live in good conditions with her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cashew nuts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy men's and women's clothes

loans.name: Las Flores 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Antonia is one of the members of the group Las Flores 1 & 2 (The Flower). She lives in a simple structure with her one of two children, which she raised after becoming a widow. Ana is excited about her second loan with Kiva partner, Esperanza, after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business. 

She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing clothing, cosmetics products, and shoes in the main market in Santiago, and then bringing them back to her community to sell in her home or by walking. She will use her profits to invest in her business. She intends to invest in her home by building a concrete structure in the short-term future and improve her business into a big store.

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients (many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti). Her group is located in Santiago, an area famous for tobacco and beef production. Santiago is the second largest city in the Dominican Republic, where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, handbags, wallets, etc.

loans.name: Ana Susana

texts.es:
Ana, es una joven D. 26 años D. edad, resiD. en El Transito, departamento D. San Miguel, vive alquilando vivienda, junto a su esposo y una hija D. 3 años D. edad, administra una sala D. belleza y venta D. ropa, este negocio lo inicio hace un año, trabajo anteriormente y aprendió el oficio, su horario es D. 8:00am a 5:00pm.
Ella necesita para su negocio mobiliario, por esta razón solicita un préstamo que le permita comprar sillas y estantes, ya que carece D. estos y le son necesarios para atender a sus clientes y que este cómodos, también mostrar su mercadería sin mayor problema.
Esta compra le ayudara a tener en mejores condiciones el salón D. belleza y recibir a sus clientes en un lugar más adecuado, su objetivo es ser una microempresaria D. éxito, aumentar el volumen D. clientes y en su familia, pues cada mejorar la calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Ana is a young woman of 26 who lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department.  She lives in a rental house together with her husband and 3 year-old daughter.  Ana runs a beauty salon and sells clothes.  She started her business one year ago.  Prior to that she worked and learned the traD..  She works from 8.00am to 5.00pm.

Ana needs furniture for her business.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy chairs and shelves as she doesn't have these and they are necessary in order for her to be able to serve her customers and make them comfortable.  She would also like to be able to display her merchandise without problems.

This purchase will help Ana to have her beauty salon in a better condition and enable her to receive her customers in a more suitable place.  Her goal is to be a successful small businesswoman, to increase her number of customers, and to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chairs and shelves for her business

loans.name: Sonia Carolina

texts.es:
Sonia, tiene 25 años D. edad, resiD. en Santa Elena, departamento D. Usulután, se dedica a vender ropa, zapatos y accesorios, vive con su madre y dos hijos, también su esposo, inicio el negocio hace dos años por iniciativa propia, debido a las necesidades económicas que enfrentaba, no tiene un horario definido y actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería: ropa y accesorios D. belleza.
Esta inversión le será D. mucho beneficio, pues contara con más productos para ofrecer a los clientes y estará encaminando el negocio hacia el logro D. sus metas y objetivos que como comerciante tiene, también velando por el bienestar D. su familia.
texts.en: Sonia, who is 25, lives in Santa Elena in Usulután department, where she sells clothing, shoes, and accessories. She lives with her mother and two children, as well as her husband. She started the business on her own initiative two years ago because of the economic hardships she faced. She has no set schedule and right now she requests a loan in order to purchase merchandise: clothing and beauty accessories. This investment will be of great help to her, since she will have more products to offer her customers. She will also be steering the business toward accomplishing the goals and objectives she has as a businesswoman, as well as watching over the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and beauty accessories.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: La señora Luz Marina, tiene 55 años. Es una persona trabajadora y disfruta de su actividad que es la venta de frutas y verduras. Tiene más de 3 años  con este medio de vida, que con propios recursos ha logrado obtener este medio de vida. La ubicación de su negocio es en el mercado en donde la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a para comprar la variedad de frutas y verduras que Luz Marina ofrece. Trabaja todos días de la semana, por lo que tiene que llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Este crédito es para la compra de mangos, melones, sandias, tomates, cebollas, chiltoma, aguacate, naranjas entre otros. Ella sueña con agrandar su negocio y mejorar cada día más el servicio.
texts.en: Luz Marina is 55 years old. She is a hardworking individual and enjoys her profession of selling fruits and vegetables. She has more than three years of experience in this line of work. Using her own resources she has managed to obtain this standard of living. Her business is located in the market where most of her customers arrive to buy the variety of fruits and vegetables that Luz offers. She works every day of the week because she is the breadwinner in her family.  This loan will be used to buy mangoes, melons, watermelons, tomatoes, onions, sweet peppers, avocados, oranges, etc. She dreams of expanding her business and improving service each day.

loans.use: to buy mangoes, melons, watermelons, onions, sweet peppers, avocados, and oranges

loans.name: Grettel

texts.es:
Grettel  U. P.
Operación 2011-81
500000 colones

Grettel U. P. tiene 41 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto año del colegio, vive con su esposo y 2 hijos menores de edad, uno está en la escuela y el mayor en el colegio. Llegó a Fundación Mujer por referencia de una clienta Elia Ruiz, quien tiene una panadería y ha trabajado con esta institución desde el año 2004. Gretel está solicitando su tercer crédito y ha tenido una excelente conducta de pago.
La clienta se dedica al comercio de ropa de hombre, mujer y niño desde hace mas de 10 años, ella trabaja con su esposo quien se dedica también al comercio, su herramienta principal es el vehículo, el cual utilizan para el transporte de mercadería y el cobro, hace unos meses sufrieron un accidente de tránsito, la persona responsable no se ha hecho cargo de los daños, por lo que solicitan este préstamo para comprar repuestos para el carro y ponerlo en funcionamiento nuevamente, ya que es urgente para su negocio.
Entre sus labores diarias esta la visita a sus clientes, recoger pedidos y atender las labores del hogar, esto se ha dificultado a causa del accidente. Una de sus metas es realizarse como comerciante y poner un local en la zona céntrica de Puntarenas, cuidad de la costa pacífica de Costa Rica, donde ella reside.
El beneficio con el crédito sería enorme, ya que pondría en funcionamiento una de sus principales herramientas para el negocio.
texts.en:
Grettel  U. P.
Operation 2011-81
500000 colones

Grettel U. P., 41, finished tenth grade.  She lives with her husband and two minor children. One of them is in elementary school and the oldest is in secondary school.  She came to Fundación Mujer referred by a client, Elia Ruiz, who has a bakery and has worked with the institution since 2004.  Gretel is asking for her third loan and has had an excellent payment history.

She has been selling clothing for men, women and children for over 10 years.  She works with her husband who is also a merchant.  Her main work tool is a vehicle that they use to transport the merchandise and to collect payments.  A few months ago they were in a traffic accident.  The person to blame has not paid damages to date so they need a loan to buy replacement parts for the car and get it in working order again because it’s urgently needed for their business.

Among her daily tasks is visiting customers, taking orders and seeing to her domestic chores.  Because of the accident, all this has become more difficult.  One of her goals is to become fulfilled as a merchant and to open a centrally located store in Puntarenas, a city on Costa Rica’s Pacific coast, which is where she lives.

The benefit of the loan would be enormous because it would put her main work tool back to work for the business.

loans.use: to repair her vehicle.

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
Don José, tiene 45 años de edad, reside en El Transito, departamento de San Miguel, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y tiene tres hijos de 18, 15 y 12 años de edad; él inicio el negocio con el apoyo de su padre, hoy día alquila el terreno donde siembra sus cultivos, no tiene un horario definido para atenderlo.
Actualmente solicita préstamo para insumos agrícolas (abono, fertilizantes), para preparar el terreno y disponerse a realizar el cultivo, esta compra es muy necesaria para don José, pues se acerca la temporada de invierno.
Su objetivo es tener cada año más oportunidad de cultivar, obtener una buena cosecha, para comercializarla y vivir en condiciones dignas con su familia.
texts.en: Don José, who is 45, lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department, with his wife and three children, aged 18, 15 and 12. He started farming with his father's help, and today he rents the land where he grows his crops. He has no set schedule for tending it. Right now he requests a loan for agricultural supplies (manure and fertilizers), in order to prepare the land and get it ready for planting. This purchase is very important for Don José because it is getting close to winter. His goals are to have more opportunity for planting every year and to have a good harvest, in order to sell it and live in decent conditions with his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Patricia Evelyn

texts.es:
Patricia, tiene 31 años de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, tiene casa propia donde vive con su hija de 9 años; ella administra un negocio el cual tiene 4 años de existir, su venta es de productos naturales, esencias, candelas, cremas curativas.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería, ya que desea incrementar su inventario y su alternativa son los prestamos.
Su aspiración es tener un negocio rentable, que le proporcione ganancias para cubrir sus necesidades y las de su hija.
texts.en: Patricia, who is 31, lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department. She has her own house where she lives with her 9 year-old daughter. She manages a business which has been in existence for 4 years, selling natural products, essences, candles, and healing creams. Right now she needs a loan in order to purchase merchandise, since she wants to increase her inventory and she can only do this through a loan. Her goal is to have a profitable business that provides enough earnings to meet her needs and those of her daughter.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna tiene 45 años, vive con sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Toda su vida ha estado dedicada a la agricultura y hoy es una de las fuentes de ingreso muy importantes para su familia, por esta razón es que todos trabajan de manera conjunta desde muy temprano para cuidar sus terrenos. Asimismo se dedica a la crianza de animales como vacas que tiene en su establo, actividad que le ayuda a mejorar su economía, ya que puede vender la leche que extrae y de ella elaborar quesos. Sus  hijos y su esposo siempre la apoyan en el trabajo, sabe que esta actividad requiere darle tiempo y esfuerzo, es muy sacrificado y más cuando la temperatura baja que en ocasiones perjudica sus cosechas. Pese a ello continuará esforzándose en su trabajo. Es su primer crédito con MFP, y esta muy agradecida de contar con este apoyo por lo que será muy beneficioso, además considera de mucha responsabilidad el pertenecer a un grupo comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono para mejorar su próxima producción.
texts.en:
Reyna is 45 years old and lives in her own house with her two children. She has worked in agriculture for her entire life, and today it is one of the most important sources of income for her family. For this reason, they all start working together very early in the morning in order to care for their land. Reyna also raises animals like cattle, which she keeps in a stable. This activity helps improve her economic situation because she can sell the milk and make cheeses from it. Her children and husband are always supportive of her work, as they know that it requires time and effort. It is work that requires sacrifice, especially when the temperatures drop and they sometimes lose crops. Despite this, Reyna will continue striving in her work.

This is her first loan with MFP and she is grateful to be able to count on this support, which will be very beneficial to her. She also thinks it is an important responsibility to belong to the communal bank. She will use the requested loan to invest in the purchase of sacks of fertilizer, in order to improve her next harvest.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Hector Arely

texts.es:
Don Héctor, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de jarcia (lazos, pitas) tiene 55 años de edad, vive con esposa y una hija, tienen casa propia y él atiende el negocio de jarcia, cultivo de maíz y crianza de ganado.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en preparar el terreno para la siembra de maíz, con este dinero comprara tratamiento para la tierra, fertilizantes y abonos, además que si alcanza comprara unos terneros para aumentar su ganado.
El tiene como objetivo trabajar por mejoras el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Héctor lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department.  He is 55 years old and lives with his wife and daughter.  They own their own home and Héctor works selling rope, growing corn and raising livestock.

Héctor is currently requesting a loan to invest in preparing his land for sowing corn.  He will use this money to buy treatments for his land: fertilizers and manure.  If the money stretches far enough, he will also buy some calves to increase his herd.

Héctor's goal is to work in order to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Mirna Jeannette

texts.es:
Mirna, tiene 30 años de edad, reside en El Transito, departamento de San Miguel, vive con sus tres hijos y su madre, administra una tienda de productos de primera necesidad y tiene una panadera desde hace 5 años, por el momento su dificultad es la falta  alguna mercadería para el negocio.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería y abastecer la tienda, atendiendo mejor a los clientes, sus propósitos son mejorar los negocios, estabilizarse con su familia y superar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mirna is 30 years old.  She lives in El Transito, in San Miguel department, with her three children and her mother.  Mirna runs a store selling essentials and she has also owned a bakery for five years.  At the moment, her difficulty is that she lacks some merchandise for her business.

Mirna is requesting a loan to buy merchandise with which to stock her store so that she can better serve her customers.  Her goals are to improve her businesses, to stabilize her family and to help her children to do well.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es:
Marcos, de 33 años de edad, reside en Usulután, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 6 y 1 años de edad, se dedica a un taller de repuestos y venta de bicicletas, tiene 6 años de estar en el negocio en la ciudad de El Transito.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para comprar una motocicleta,  ayudándole a tener un medio de transporte de su casa al taller y viceversa.
Su aspiración es mejorar cada día sus fuentes de ingreso, ayudar a sus hijos y velar por su bienestar
texts.en:
Marcos is 33 years old and lives with his wife and two children (ages 6 and 1) in Usulután.  He sells bicycles and runs a parts shop.  He has been in this business for 6 years in the city of El Transito.  

He currently is in need of a loan to buy a motorcycle, which he would use to commute between work and home. Marcos strives each day to better his sources of income, help his children and secure their well-being.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 62 años, vive en compañía D. su esposo en su casa propia. DesD. su niñez aprendió todo lo necesario para dedicarse a las tareas del campo, es así que siembra regularmente papa, maíz, habas, trigo entre otros productos, que luego son vendidos en el mercado mayorista. Esta actividad lo realiza en compañía D. familia, pero cuando se requiere D. mucho esfuerzo contrata la mano D. obra D. los jornaleros, así logra en menor tiempo sembrar o cosechar. Asimismo hace uso D. la yuntas o del tractor para optimizar mejor su trabajo. Sin embargo las bajas temperaturas hacen que perjudique sus plantas  y su producción. Pero ella sigue adelante en su trabajo por que sabe que cuando hay tiempo D. escasez hay también tiempos D. abundancia y eso la anima a continuar adelante. Es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta D. formar parte D. su banco comunal ya que ha escuchado que la forma D. trabajo es ventajosa y se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra D. fertilizantes y en el pago D. jornaleros que prepararan su terreno D. cultivo para su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Elena is a 62-year-old woman who lives with her husband in their own home. Ever since childhood, she learned everything she needed to know about working the fields, so it is that she regularly grows potatoes, corn, beans, and wheat, among other crops, which are then sold at the wholesale market. She works the land with the help of her family, but when more help is needed, she hires day laborers so that she can plant or harvest in less time. She also makes use of oxen or a tractor in order to maximize her work. Nevertheless, the low temperatures harm her plants and production. Still, she presses on with her work because she knows that just like there are times of shortage, there are times of abundance, and this idea inspires her to keep moving forward.

This is the first time that she obtains a loan from MFP. She is very happy to be a part of her community bank because she has heard that working with it is advantageous, and she commits herself to be punctual with her repayments. The loan that she is requesting will be invested in purchasing fertilizer and paying the day laborers who prepare her crop fields for the next planting season.

loans.use: to hire day laborers who will prepare her field for the next planting season.

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es:
José Miguel, tiene 33 años de edad, reside en Usulután, se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, vive con su familia, tiene 10 años de ser agricultor y 2 años de dedicarse a la ganadería.
Invertirá un préstamo en la compra de insumos agrícolas, fertilizantes, abonos, esto ayudara a que realice la siembra en una manzana de terreno, teniendo lo necesario para el crecimiento del maíz.
Sus aspiraciones es tener mucho ganado y en la agricultura pues tener una cosecha abundante.
texts.en:
José Miguel is 33 years old and lives in Usulután with his family.  He farms and raises livestock.  He has been a farmer for 10 years and has been raising livestock for 2 years.

José Miguel will invest his loan in buying farming supplies, fertilizers and manure.  This will help him to sow his 'manzana' (just over one and a half acres) of land and he will have available what he needs to grow his corn.

José Miguel's aspirations are to own a lot of livestock and to enjoy an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: La señorita angélica es soltera, es buena la satisfacción saber que es una chica que lucha en la vida por valores de crecimiento así mismo con la institución Emprender de la misma manera mejorar  su educación profesional, la actividad que tiene es la venta de ropa en un puesto fijo y gracias al apoyo de la institución emprender podrá adquirir mercadería de temporada a bajo costo, sacrificada pero rentable, inicio su negocio el 2002 de manera muy humilde obteniendo buenos resultados debido  a esta razón es que se animo a solicitar crédito para comprar mercadería de temporada en pantalones es muy trabajadora , responsable con ganas de superación, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Miss Angelica is single. It is good to know that she is a young woman who fights for her values of development. With the Emprender institute, she hopes to improve her professional education. She sells clothing for a living in a fixed stall, and thanks to the Emprender institute's support, she will be able to obtain seasonal merchandise at a low cost. Her business is hard work, but lucrative. She started her business humbly in 2002, but got good results, which is why she decided to request a loan to obtain this season's merchandise, like pants. Responsible and with the desire for self-improvement, she is grateful to the institute for the support it has given her.

loans.use: to purchase this season's merchandise.

loans.name: Sugeida Concepcion

texts.es:
Sugeida, reside en  Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su hermano y su hijo, tiene casa propia y administra una tienda de productos de consumo, este negocio nació hace 6 años, con apoyo de financiamientos.
Por el momento su necesidad en el negocio es un freezer y más productos de consumo, para cual solicita un préstamo que le cubra el gasto y solvente la necesidad.
Para Sugeida el objetivo es dar a su hijo los estudios necesarios, trabajar por sus necesidades y por lo mismo trabaja diario para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Sugeida resides in Jiquilisco, Usulutan department. She is 28 years old and lives with her brother and her child in her own house. She operates a consumer products store. The business was born some 6 years ago, with the help of loans.

At present, her business needs are a freezer and more consumer products. For that reason, she requests a loan to cover the costs and satisfy the necessity.

For Sugeida, her objectives are to provide for her son's educational needs, to work for their basic necessities, and at the same time, work daily to improve her earnings.

loans.use: TO BUY A FREEZER AND TO EXPAND HER INVENTORY OF CONSUMER PRODUCTS

loans.name: Hever Anthonyn

texts.es:
Hever, es un joven de 25 años de edad, reside en Usulután, donde vive con sus padres, el es soltero y se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, trabaja como panificador y vendedor de pan desde hace 5 años.
El solicita un préstamo para la reparación de su motocicleta y también para la compra de lámina para su vivienda, dicho préstamo la ayudara a Hever para mejorar las condiciones de su medio de transporte, también mejorar su vivienda.
El en el futuro, se imagina siendo dueño de una panadería, la cual él administre y de empleo a más personas.
texts.en:
Hever is a young man, 25 years old, who resides in Usulután, where he lives with his parents. He is single, and he works preparing and selling bread. He has worked as a bread baker and vendor for 5 years. 

He is requesting a loan in order to repair his small motorcycle, and also to buy sheeting for his home. This loan will help Hever improve the condition of his means of transportation and also improve his home. 

For the future, he can imagine himself as the owner of a bakery which he manages himself, giving jobs to more people.

loans.use: to repair his small motorcycle and also to buy sheeting to improve his home.

loans.name: Tania Carolina

texts.es:
Tania, tiene 36 años de edad, reside en Puerto es Triunfo, departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, vive con sus hijas de 12 y 10 años de edad, tiene casa propia; El negocio lo inicio hace 16 años en que ofrece mariscos y también verduras.
Por el momento  solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería, tanto verduras como mariscos,  que le ayude a mejorar su cantidad de inventario y tener mejores oportunidades de venta.
En un futuro sueña tener su propio vehículo, para el transporte de mercadería.
texts.en:
Tania is 36 years old and lives in Puerto el Triunfo, in Usulután department, with her daughters who are 12 and 10.  She owns her own home.  Tania's business is selling seafood.  She started her business 16 years ago and she sells seafood and also vegetables.

Tania is currently requesting a loan to buy merchandise (both vegetables and seafood).  This will help her to improve her stock levels and provide her with better sales opportunities.

In the future, Tania dreams of owning her own vehicle in which she can transport her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy seafood and vegetables

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina, tiene 65, es viuda, con 5 hijos. Pertenece al Banco Comunal Unión II.
Solicita un crédito D. S/. 3000.00.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D. mercaderías como: Arroz, azúcar, fideos, conservas, harina, huevos, aguas gaseosas, helados, cerveza, entre otros.
Justina antes era feriante, pero desD. el año 1991 decidió abrir una pequeña bodega en su casa y poco a poco lo fue surtiendo.
Ingresó a FINCA Perú, por la invitación D. una amiga. Lo que más le agrada es el incentivo al ahorro, la enseñanza D.  valores y los momentos gratos que pasa con sus con socias.
Ahora está ahorrando para la construcción del segundo piso D. su casa. Su sueño es que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Justina is 65 years old, she is a widow, she has 5 children and she is a member of the Banco Comunal Unión II (Union II Communal Bank).
She is requesting a loan of 3000.00 PEN.
The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of products such as rice, sugar, noodles, canned foods, flour, eggs, sparkling waters, ice-creams and beer among others.
Until 1991 Justina was a trader, but then she decided to open a small grocery store in her house, and little by little she has been furnishing it ever since.
She entered into FINCA Peru thanks to the invitation from a friend. What she likes the most in the motivation to saving, the values they teach and the pleasant moments she spends with her fellow members.
She is currently saving to have the second floor of her house built, and she hopes for her activity to keep on growing.

loans.use: To buy products to supply her grocery store shop.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco tiene 46  años, vive con su esposa y sus hijos en su casa propia. Desde muy joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura y a la ganadería y ahora  tiene sus propios terrenos que le permiten desarrollar con libertad estas actividades. Trabaja desde horas de la madrugada a entregar lo que ha cosechado y según la temporada del año y cuando es necesario venden animales que posee y son llevados en las ferias ganaderas de su zona. Considera que le gusta esta actividad por que le permite estar en contacto con la naturaleza. Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, tiene buenas referencias de trabajos en bancos comunales por lo que se animó a tener  un grupo y del cual se compromete ser un buen socio. Con el crédito que solicita, le servirá para comprar sacos de abono.
texts.en: Francisco is 46 years old and lives with his wife and children in his own home.  He has been farming and raising livestock since he was very young.  He now owns his own land which allows him to carry out these activities freely.  Francisco works from very early in the morning, delivering what he has harvested and, according to the season and when it is necessary, he sells animals. His animals are taken to the livestock markets in his area.  Francisco enjoys this business because it allows him to be in touch with nature.  This is his first loan from MFP.  He has good references from working with other community banks.  He was keen to join this group and pledges to be a good member.  He will use the loan he is requesting to buy sacks of manure.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure

loans.name: Ana Daisy

texts.es:
Doña Ana, tiene 56 años, resiD. en Usulután, vive con su esposo y su madre, la vivienda en familiar, ella se dedica a la venta D. pupusas y meriendas, lleva 16 años vendiendo meriendas y pupusas tiene 5 años D. elaborarlas.
Ella necesita un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería para la preparación D. meriendas, más que todo son comestibles como frijol, arroz, huevos, aceite, tomates y cebollas, ya que con estos elabora los platillos.
Su aspiración es un local propio, amplio donD. pueda atender a los cliente D. una manera mejor.
texts.en:
Ana is 56 years old and lives in Usulután, with her husband and mother, in her family home.  Her business is selling pupusas and snacks.  She has been selling snacks and pupusas for five years.

Ana needs this loan to buy supplies for making her snacks.  Above all, she needs to buy food products such as beans, rice, eggs, oil, tomatoes and onions as this is what she uses to make her food.

Ana's aspiration is to own her own large premises where she can better serve her customers.

loans.use: to buy products such as beans, rice, eggs, oil, tomatoes and onions

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es:
Carmela tiene 73 años y es viuda con 5 hijos. Pertenece al Banco Comunal Unión II.
Solicita un crédito D. S/. 1 500.00.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra D. carne, aderezos, maíz, lechuga  y leña.
Carmela tiene un horno en su casa, donD. prepara asado D. chancho al horno y luego lo venD. en 5 Esquinas que es una D. las calles principales D. Ayacucho. Es una actividad que lo realiza todos los días con su hijo y nuera. Ingreso a FINCA Perú por la invitación D. su sobrina, le gusta por la facilidad D. los créditos y pueD. ahorrar. Con los ahorros que tenia pudo hacer el mantenimiento a su casa. Su sueño es que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Carmela is 73 years old, widowed, and has 5 children.  She is a member of the Unión II community bank.  She is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles.

Carmela will invest her loan in buying meat, seasonings, corn, lettuce and firewood.

Carmela has an oven in her home where she makes roast pork which she then sells in 5 Esquinas which is one of the main streets in Ayacucho.  She carries out her business every day with the help of her son and her daughter-in-law.  Carmela joined FINCA Perú through an invitation from her cousin.  She likes it because of the ease of the loans and the fact that she is able to save.  She has been able to use her savings to do some work on her home.  Her dream is for her business to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy meat, seasonings, corn and firewood for making roast pork

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma tiene 55 años y es viuda con 3 hijos. Pertenece al Banco Comunal Unión II.
Solicita un crédito de S/. 1500.00.
Vilma tiene un taller de artesanía y bodega.
El crédito que solicita una parte lo destinará para comprar hilos procesados, ácidos y anilinas para los trabajos de artesanía. Tambien una parte lo destinará a comprar mercaderia para su bodega como: arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite, huevos, papel higiénico, detergentes, jabones, entre otros.
Vilma vive en el barrio tradicional de Santa Ana, barrio de artesanos, y hace trabajos de tejidos en telares como: pisos, individuales, carteras, etc. Este oficio lo aprendió desde muy pequeña de sus abuelos. Vilma atiende pedidos que le hacen de Bolivia y Juliaca mensualmente. Para ayudarse tiene una bodega en su casa y le va bien.
Su sueño es que su negocio sea prospero y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Vilma is 55 years old, a widow, and she has 3 children. She is a member of the communal bank named "Union II". 

She requests a loan of S/. 1500

She has a craft shop and a grocery store. 

The loan that she requests will be used in part to purchase threads, and chemicals such as acids and anilines to use in the making of her crafts. Another part of her loan will be destined to purchase merchandise for her grocery store, such as rice, sugar, pastas, cooking oil, eggs, bathroom tissue, detergents, soaps, and others. 

Vilma lives in the traditional neighborhood of Santa Ana. It is a neighborhood of artisans and she makes weaves and fabrics, such as floor mats, placemats, wallets, etc. She learned this business from here grand parents when she was very young. Vilma fills orders placed from Bolivia and Juliaca on a monthly basis. As another source of support she has a grocery store and it is going well. 

Her dream is to have a prosperous business and to see her children have a career.

loans.use: to purchase threads, acids, and anilines

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is a member of the communal bank "Union II" at FINCA Peru. She has two children: a 20-year old son studying engineering in Lima and a 14-year old daughter studying in Ayacucho. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for 15 years now, and started off with a business selling ice and cosmetics. Now she also rents rooms to students in Ayacucho, and rents the first floor to a commercial tenant. She is currently adding a fourth floor to her building to have an additional 8 rooms to rent. She will be using her current loan of 1,750 PEN to help her purchase an apartment in Lima, where her son can live and she can rent out the extra rooms.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos Q.habita en su propia casa con dos de sus nietos en Lourdes Colon, Departamento  de La Libertad. Desde hace 10 años  Doña Santos  mantiene una pequeña tienda en su casa de habitación, en donde ofrece variedad de artículos como: papel, detergente, sal, azúcar, pan dulce, golosinas entre otros. Ha trabajado duramente para lograr mantener activa su pequeña tiendita que durante mucho tiempo ha sido y sigue siendo su fuente de ingresos. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito para  poder comprar una mayor variedad de productos tales como: café, leche, azúcar, arroz, galletas y de más productos que le permitan  atraer una mayor cantidad de clientes que le generen mayores ingresos para aspirar a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Santos Q.lives in her own home with two of her grandchildren in Lourdes Colon, in La Libertad department.  For 10 years, Santos has had a small store in her home where she offers a variety of products such as paper, detergent, salt, sugar, sweet bread, candies, etc.  She has worked hard to keep her small store going as it has been her source of income for a long time and continues to be so.  For this reason, she has decided to request a loan so that she can buy a larger variety of products such as coffee, milk, sugar, rice, cookies, and other products that will allow her to attract a larger number of customers.  This will make her more income and she will be able to aspire to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy paper, detergent, salt, sugar, sweet bread, candies, etc.

texts.en:

Chantha and her husband are farmers. They grow various vegetables on their farmland in the village. They sell their vegetables to a middleman who visits their home to buy them.

Chantha hopes to put an addition on her house, to make their home better for their family to live in.  She is applying for a loan of $500 which will be used to build that addition.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Liliana Gabriela

texts.es: Liliana Gabriela C. A. de 24 años de edad vive en casa de su compañero de vida junto a sus dos pequeños hijos. Liliana es un ejemplo de mujer trabajadora y luchadora. Posee un pequeño negocio en donde vende Hot Dog, carne asada y café. Ubicado en el Municipio de San Marcos Departamento de San Salvador. Lugar que es muy conocido ya que se encuentra en una zona céntrica y  concurrida. Liliana empieza el día desde muy temprano con el fin de tener preparados sus ricos Hot Dog a la  hora que los clientes la busquen. En este negocio lo más importante es la satisfacción del cliente por lo que la amabilidad, higiene, y buen sabor de los platillos es lo más importante para Liliana. Gracias a su arduo trabajo y confianza en Dios la demanda de su deliciosa comida ha aumentado y ha decidido invertir en su negocio para poder ofrecer variedad, calidad y mayor cantidad de sus productos. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar la materia prima necesaria como: pan, salchichas, carne, aderezos, gas propano y de más productos necesarios para la elaboración de sus platillos. Con la Fe puesta en Dios que de esta forma podrá obtener mejores ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia que cada día necesitan un poco más.
texts.en:
Liliana Gabriela C. A. is 24 years old and lives in her life partner's home together with her two young children.  Liliana is an example of a hard-working and driven woman.  She owns a small business where she sells hot dogs, grilled meat and coffee.  Her business is located in the town of San Marcos, in San Salvador department.  The area is very well known as it is in a busy, central area. 

Liliana starts her day very early in order to have her delicious hot dogs ready when her customers come to buy them.  The most important thing in Liliana's business is customer satisfaction.  For this reason, she is kind to her customers, prepares her food hygienically and makes good-tasting food.  Thanks to her hard work and her faith in God, demand for her delicious food has increased and she has decided to invest in her business in order to be able to offer a wider variety of products, better quality products and more products.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy the supplies she needs such as bread, sausages, meat, dressings, propane gas and other products in order to make her dishes.  She has placed her faith in God that in this way she will be able to make more income and improve the quality of life of her family who need a little more every day.

loans.use: to buy bread, sausages, meat, dressings, propane gas, etc.

location.town: San Marcos, departamento de San Salvador

loans.name: Baasankhuu

texts.en:
Baasankhuu is 51 years old, lives with her husband and four children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They all live together in small wooden house on their land. Her 3 older daughters have graduated secondary school and are unemployed at the moment. They help their mother with her business and the youngest son attends a local secondary school.

Baasankhuu has rented a stall at the crowded market and operated a vegetables and fruits retail business for the last 10 years. In 2008, she began to grow vegetables on her own land. She sold her wooden house and purchased livestock from the money she got. She has hired help to herd her livestock and in future, she is planning on running a meat business. Spring is the time to grow stable food vegetables, therefore she requests a loan to buy some vegetable seeds and to prepare her land for farming.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds and prepare her land for farming

loans.name: Delmy Maidel

texts.es: Delmy Maidel R. de 24 años de edad habita en casa de su familia con su pequeña hija, abuela, madre, dos hermanas y un hermano. Vive en condiciones muy humildes en  una de las zonas rurales de Santa Tecla. La situación de Delmy es muy difícil pero tiene la confianza en dios que un día las cosa van a mejorar. Ella posee un negocio de productos de belleza en donde ofrece variedad de: tintes, lociones, gel, maquillaje, cremas, desodorantes, etc. Ubicado frente al mercado municipal de Santa Tecla. Zona muy concurrida ya que se encuentra en el centro del municipio. El Sueño de esta mujer es poder darle a su hija todo lo necesario para que pueda desarrollarse en mejores condiciones y pueda seguir estudiando hasta convertirse en profesional. Razón por la cual solicita este crédito para poder surtir su negocio con variedad de artículos tales como: accesorios para el cabello, variedad de maquillaje, joyería, cremas, entre otros con el fin de mantener su negocio abastecido para que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan y de esta manera atraer a nuevos cliente y así poder obtener un poco mas de ganancia para seguir dando lo necesario a sus parientes.
texts.en:
Delmy Maidel R. is 24 years old and lives in her family home together with her young daughter, grandmother, mother, two sisters and a brother.  She lives in very humble conditions in one of the rural areas of Santa Tecla.  Delmy's situation is very difficult but she trusts in God that one day things will improve.

Delmy owns a business selling beauty products including dyes, lotions, gels, makeup, creams and deodorants.  Her business is located opposite Santa Tecla Town Market.  This is a very busy area as it is in the center of town.  Delmy's dream is to be able to provide her daughter with everything she needs in order to grow up in better conditions and continue studying until she becomes a professional.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan so that she can stock her business with a variety of products such as hair accessories, makeup, jewelry, creams, etc.  In this way, she will keep her business well stocked so that her customers can always find what they are looking for.  It will also enable her to attract new customers and thereby make a little more profit so that she can continue providing her family members with what they need.

loans.use: to buy hair accessories, makeup, jewelry, creams, etc.

location.town: Santa Tecla, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.en:
Vladimir is married with a seven-year-old daughter. He runs a greenhouse business growing tomatoes, cucumbers, potatoes, cabbage etc. He has got three greenhouses where he grows vegetables for sale. Vladimir has been in this business for 15 years. Making sure that the vegetables mature early in spring provides a good income for Vladimir’s family.
Vladimir is requesting a loan of 10,000 UAH to purchase farming supplies for this season – seedling and fertilizers. He also needs to purchase some film to repair his greenhouses. Vladimir enjoys his business and would like to develop it further by building a new greenhouse next year.

loans.use: to purchase film, fertilizers and seedlings for his greenhouses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is 28 years old and married with one three-year-old child. He has a mixed farm in Nkubu town in eastern Kenya that produces bananas, tomatoes and maize. He has been in the farming business for five years now and employs one farmhand. He sells all his products to the local market.
Godfrey has requested a loan of 80,000 KES through Kiva partner, Juhudi Kilimo, to expand his banana farm. He intends to use this loan to buy farm inputs, irrigation equipment and improve on the quality of his bananas. The income from this project will help him provide for the basic needs of his family. His major challenges have been unpredictable weather conditions and fluctuations in the market price of his products. He is planning to acquire another piece of land in future to enable him to expand his banana farming.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, irrigation equipment and expand his banana farming

loans.name: Lorena Angélica

texts.es: Lorena Angélica M. R. de 39 años de edad vive en su casa con su esposo  y sus dos hijos. Tiene una tienda en su casa de habitación ubicada en el Municipio de Sonsonate Departamento del mismo nombre. En su tienda ofrece  variedad de productos tales como: aceite, papel, canela, pan dulce, golosinas,  etc. Su sueño es contar con los recursos necesarios para invertir en su pequeña tiendita para poder ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes y poder aspirar a una mejor calidad de vida. Gracias al carisma de Doña Lorena ha logrado tener muchos clientes que siempre están buscando sus productos ya que ella siempre está pendiente de tener lo más necesario y atender de la mejor manera a sus clientes. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito para comprar variedad de productos tales como: azúcar, sal, café, variedad de golosinas, detergente, gas propano, entre otros. De Esta manera podría satisfacer mejor la demanda de sus clientes quienes la aprecian mucho por tener siempre los productos que demandan y sobre todo amabilidad a la hora de realizar su trabajo. De esta forma podría seguir ayudando a sus hijos a superarse y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lorena Angélica M. R. is 39 years old and lives in her own home together with her husband and two children.  She has a store in her home which is located in the town of Sonsonate, in the department of the same name.  In her store, she offers a variety of products such as oil, paper, cinnamon, sweet bread, candies, etc.  Her dream is to have the necessary financial resources to invest in her small store so that she can offer a wider variety of products to her customers and aspire to a better quality of life.

Thanks to her charisma, Lorena has many customers who are always looking to buy her products since she always makes sure that she has the right products available and serves her customers well.  She decided to request a loan so that she could buy a variety of products such as sugar, salt, coffee, a variety of candies, detergent, propane gas etc.  This will enable her to better satisfy her customer demand.  Her customers are very fond of her because she always has the products that they request and, above all, because she is very kind.  In this way, Lorena will be able to continue helping her children to get improve themselves and their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, coffee, candies, detergent, propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Lidia Ester

texts.es: Lidia Ester D. de treinta y tres años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos en casa propia en el departamento de Usulután. Ella posee una venta de mariscos en el Puerto el Triunfo. Lidia es una mujer emprendedora llena de muchos sueños y metas es por eso que ella siempre esta entregada a su trabajo, se levanta desde muy temprano a vender su producto sus clientes la prefieren por sus buenos precios y por la frescura del marisco, la demanda esta cada vez más grande, es por eso que se decidió en solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar conchas, pescado, camarón entre otros, para así poder satisfacer a sus clientes y al mismo tiempo llevar día a día el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en: Lidia Ester D. is 33 years old and lives with her life partner and four children in her own home in Usulután department.  She owns a seafood stall in Puerto el Triunfo.  Lidia is an enterprising woman who is full of dreams and goals.  For this reason, she is always committed to her work.  She gets up very early to sell her products to her customers.  Her customers like to buy from her because her prices are good and her seafood is fresh.  Her demand keeps increasing and so she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy shellfish, fish, shrimp and other products so that she can satisfy her customers and, at the same time, support her household from day to day.

loans.use: to buy shellfish, fish and shrimp

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John I., 36, is a married father of three children aged two months, four and eight. He has been practising mixed farming for the last three years in his home town of Nkubu in eastern Kenya. His mixed farm produces bananas, miraa, maize and beans, which are all sold locally. He mainly depends on the income from his farm to cater for the basic needs of his family.
John has requested this loan of 36,750 KES through Kiva partner, Juhudi Kilimo, to purchase and insure a dairy cow. He says that with the dairy cow he will acquire, his family will be guaranteed enough milk for domestic consumption and sale. The extra income from the sale of milk will enable him to pay school fees for his children. His primary challenges have been pests and diseases, unpredictable weather and lack of enough water. In future, he plans to acquire three more dairy cows and move from the local banana farming to tissue culture banana farming.
John says that Juhudi is the most efficient microfinance institution in the region.

loans.use: to purchase and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Evelyn Patricia

texts.es: Evelyn Patricia R. D. V.  D. treinta y seis años D. edad vive con su esposo en el Barrio las Delicias en el departamento D. la Unión. Ella posee un negocio en su residencia donD. venD. artículos D. decoración, enseres, vajillas, cristales. Evelyn es una mujer con mucho talento la gente la visita porque sus adornos son D. mucha calidad y muy ingeniosos; últimamente sus clientes le solicitan más D. sus creaciones y esto la motivo a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar más material para sus adornos, recuerdos D. celebraciones, cristales entre otros. Evelyn es un vivo ejemplo D. perseverancia y tiene fe que en cuanto crezca su negocio podrá llevar mas estabilidad a su hogar y una mejor calidad D. vida para su familia.
texts.en: Evelyn Patricia R. D. V. is 36 years old and lives with her husband in Las Delicias neighborhood, in La Unión department.  She has a business in her home where she sells decorative items, home furnishings, crockery and glassware.  Evelyn is a very talented lady.  People visit her business because her ornaments are very good quality and original.  Lately her customers have been requesting more of her creations and this motivated her to request a loan from INTEGRAL which would allow her to buy more material for making her ornaments, celebration gifts, glassware, etc.  Evelyn is a living example of perseverance and she has faith that when her business grows she will be able to proviD. her household with more stability and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials for making ornaments, gifts for social occasions and glassware

loans.name: Mirian Elizabeth

texts.es: Mirian Elizabeth R. D. P. D. cuarenta y cuatro años D. edad vive en casa propia con su compañero D. vida y sus cuatro hijos en el departamento D. Usulután. Ella posee una tienda en su residencia la cual tiene mucha demanda porque siempre tiene lo que el cliente necesita, además para Mirian "la mejor atención al cliente" es su lema,  y siempre está a disposición D. satisfacer a las personas. Su tienda necesita abastecerse D. mas productos, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar bebidas, granos básicos, cereales, golosinas, entre otros. Mirian tiene confianza en que al crecer su negocio le ayudara a darle un mejor futuro a su familia y así también solventar las necesidades D. su hogar.
texts.en: Mirian Elizabeth R. D. P. is 44 years old.  She lives together with her life partner and four children in her own home, in Usulután department.  Mirian has a store in her home which is very popular because she always has what her customers need.  Mirian's motto is 'best customer service' and she is always ready to keep her customers happy.  She needs to stock her store with more products and so she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy soft drinks, basic grains, cereals, candies and other products.  Mirian believes that, by growing her business, she will be able to proviD. her family with a better future and also cover her household needs.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, basic grains, cereals and candies

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael is 59 years old and married with five children aged between 14 and 30. He has a mixed farm in Nkubu town in eastern Kenya that produces coffee, bananas, maize and milk. Michael has been in the farming business for 35 years and employs two farmhands. He sells all his products locally. He solely depends on the income from his farm to cater for the needs of his family.
Michael has requested a loan of 40,000 KES through Kiva partner, Juhudi Kilimo, to purchase a dairy cow. He says that the extra income from this loan will enable him to expand his farming activities and support his family. He aspires to start a retail shop and acquire three dairy cows in the next five years. His biggest challenge has been lack of sufficient money to finance his farming business.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: I Ketut

texts.en: I Ketut T. W., 51 years old, has been married almost 30 years. His wife, Ni Nyoman Maria Coa, is a housewife who has a stall business. I Ketut T. W. has four children. The first child is married and the other three children are still living with him. I Ketut T. W. gets a loan from MUK for Rp. 5,000,000 one female cow with a price of Rp. 5,000,000. He plans to breed cattle with an injectable mating system. A cow is pregnant for nine months and gives birth to only one calf. After four months, the calf can be sold for Rp. 2,000,000. In addition to income from gardening, I Ketut T. W. hopes to raise cattle to help alleviate the expenses needed to cover their children's education.

loans.use: to buy one female cow

He is requesting a $2,400 loan to buy a new machine for his work. He is aiming to develop his work and improve his family's quality of life.

Dourgham is a blacksmith and he owns a small iron factory. It has been a family business since 2003. He is well known in his local area and has an excellent reputation.

He is requesting a $3,000 loan to pay the annual rent for his shop and to increase the procurement. He is aiming to develop his work and improve his family's quality of life.

Ali has seven years of experience in repairing car’s electricity and he has had his own workshop since 2001. He is well known in his local area and has an excellent reputation.

He is requesting a $3,000 loan to buy an electrical tester machine for new cars. He is aiming to extend his business and increase his family's quality of life.

Ma. Liz works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy more stock for her general store.

Ma. Liz has borrowed and paid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from a bakery.

Ma. Liz aspires to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

Carol has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, diapers, mineral waters, soft drinks, etc.

In the future, Carol would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

Jane has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy spices, meat, and other ingredients for her food vending.

Jane has been in this business for 10 years.  In the future, Jane would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

Benita has requested a PHP 29000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.  She has borrowed and successfully repaid 18 previous loans from NWTF.

Benita aspires to build and expand her business.

In the future, Eden would like to save enough money to expand her business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

Louella works hard to provide for her family. She has a sari-sari store in the Philippines and has been running it for the past 10 years.  She also earns additional income from rice farming.  

Louella has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell in her store.  Louella has borrowed and repaid 22 previous loans from NWTF prior to this loan. 

Louella aspires to save money to expand her business.
